title: 95. FRUIT PUNCH SLUSH
info:
FRUIT PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

6 ripe bananas
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed and undiluted
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed and undiluted
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
orange slices
3 c. water
2 c. sugar
2 (64 oz.) bottles lemon-lime carbonated beverage, chilled

preparation

Combine bananas and frozen fruit juices in blender; blend until smooth. Combine banana mixture, pineapple juice, water and sugar in large mixing bowl; mix well. Pour into plastic freezer containers or molds and freeze. To serve, thaw until mushy and add carbonated beverage. Garnish with orange slices. Yields 6 quarts.

title: 16. RUSSIAN TEA (NON-ALCOHOLIC DRINK)
info:
RUSSIAN TEA (NON-ALCOHOLIC DRINK)

ingredients

1 c. dry unsweetened instant tea
1 (10 cent) pkg. lemonade mix
1 tsp. cloves
1 large jar Tang (2 c.)
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon

preparation

Mix thoroughly and store in airtight container. (Will keep indefinitely.) Use 2 teaspoons Russian tea to 1 cup boiling water. May be served hot or chilled.

title: 244. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 small boxes Jell-O (whatever flavor desired)
6 c. sugar
1 gal. water
1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1/2 tsp. almond extract

preparation

Heat first 3 ingredients until Jell-O and sugar are dissolved. Then add remaining ingredients. Freeze in small portions. When ready to use, scrape into a slush. Add 4 or 5 quarts ginger ale or 7-Up. Use flavor of Jell-O for color desired.

title: 209. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 c. sugar
4 c. water
5 well mashed bananas
1 tall can pineapple juice
1 small can frozen orange juice, mixed with required water
juice of 2 lemons

preparation

Heat sugar and water until dissolves, then add remaining ingredients. Combine all and freeze. Serve (melt until slushy). Add equal amount of 7-Up or ginger ale and slush.

title: 34. AFRICAN SLUSH PUNCH
info:
AFRICAN SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 c. sugar
6 c. water
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 (6 oz.) can water
1 large can unsweetened pineapple juice
5 mashed bananas
3 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Boil sugar and 6 cups of water in a large saucepan for 3 minutes; let cool. Mash bananas in blender and combine in large container with fruit juices and 6 ounces of water. Add sugar mixture and blend well. Freeze for at least 24 hours. Remove from freezer 1 hour before serving. Mash to a pulp. Add ginger ale; mix and serve. Serves 8 to 10 people.

title: 237. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (3 oz.) box jello (cherry or strawberry)
1/4 c. lemon juice
1 to 2 qt. ginger ale or 7-Up
1/2 c. sugar
1 tall can pineapple juice

preparation

Mix jello according to directions. To this add sugar, lemon juice and pineapple juice. Put into containers such as margarine tubs and freeze. Put in the punch bowl. Add ginger ale or 7-Up. We prefer strawberry over cherry jello.

title: 72. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 large can crushed pineapple
6 bananas
6 c. water
2 c. sugar
1 large frozen lemonade
2 large frozen orange juice
4 large ginger ale

preparation

Blend pineapple and bananas until smooth. Add water, sugar, lemonade and orange juice. Freeze. Remove 30 minutes before serving. Then add cold ginger ale.

title: 187. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 boxes Jell-O (any flavor)
1 1/2 c. sugar
2 c. boiling water
2 (12 oz.) cans frozen lemonade
1 large can pineapple juice
1 (2 liter) ginger ale

preparation

Mix Jell-O with sugar; dissolve with water. Add lemonade (with water added as directed on can). Add pineapple juice. Freeze in Ziploc bags. Thaw about 4 hours before serving. Mix ginger ale with slushy mixture when ready to serve.

title: 275. YUMMY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
YUMMY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 c. Water
4 c. Sugar
5 Ripe bananas
1 x 16 oz. can Crushed pineapple
2 pkg. Cherry Koolaid, unsweetened
1 x 46 oz. can Pineapple juice
7-Up or Sprite

preparation

Bring the water and sugar to a full boil. Stir in the Koolaid. In a blender, mix together the bananas and pineapple to a smooth consistency. Add to first mixture, then add in pineapple juice. Freeze. To serve mix with 7-Up or Sprite. Makes 6-7 quarts.

NOTE: You can also freeze the mixture in ice cube trays for individual servings. Just put a couple in each glass then add soda pop.

title: 227. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 1/2 c. sugar
6 c. cold water
2 pkg. fruit flavored jello
1 large can pineapple juice
1 qt. orange juice
juice of 5 lemons
1 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Boil sugar in water for 3 minutes. Add jello and dissolve. Add juices and stir well. Pour into milk cartons and freeze. Remove from freezer 2 hours before serving. When ready to serve, add 1 quart of ginger ale to 1/2 gallon of punch. Mix to slush.

title: 172. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

5 mashed bananas
3 1/2 c. sugar
6 c. water
1 small can orange juice
46 oz. can pineapple juice
2 liter 7-Up

preparation

Boil sugar and water. Stir in orange juice, pineapple juice and bananas. Freeze in milk cartons until ready to serve. Tear open cartons. Pour frozen mixture in punch bowl. Add 2 liters (or more) 7-Up.

title: 17. SPICED ORANGE TEA DRINK
info:
SPICED ORANGE TEA DRINK

ingredients

1 (17 oz.) jar Tang
1 c. instant tea
1 tsp. cloves
1 tsp. cinnamon

preparation

Combine all ingredients. Makes nice gifts in decorated canisters.

title: 249. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 c. sugar
6 (6 oz.) cans frozen Hawaiian Punch
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (46 oz.) can orange juice
Squirt soda

preparation

Simmer sugar and 1 cup water until sugar is dissolved. Add all the juices and freeze. Take out 2 hours before serving. Mix 1 quart sour or Squirt with 1 pint of the slush mixture.

title: 160. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 c. water
3 1/2 c. sugar
2 small boxes Jell-O (flavor to be the color of punch you need)
2 c. boiling water
46 oz. pineapple juice
1 small can lemonade (pink or yellow, whichever matches your punch color)
3 cans cold water

preparation

Boil 2 cups boiling water and sugar for 3 minutes and set aside. Let cool. Mix Jell-O and water well until dissolved. Set aside and let cool. Mix pineapple juice, lemonade and 3 cans cold water well. After everything is cooled, mix all ingredients together and freeze. Let stand out 2 to 3 hours before using and then mix with Sprite.

title: 106. FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH
info:
FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 large can frozen grape juice
1 large can pineapple juice
1/4 c. lemon juice
1 pkg. frozen strawberries
5 bananas
4 c. sugar
3 large Sprite or ginger ale

preparation

Put bananas, lemon juice and strawberries in blender. Blend until smooth. Add to thawed grape juice and pineapple juice in a large bowl. Heat sugar and 6 cups water until sugar dissolves (do not boil). Add to fruit mixture. Mix well and freeze.

To Serve: Thaw slightly and pour Sprite or ginger ale over this. Don't use too much liquid. Punch should be thick and slushy. Make at least 3 or 4 days before serving. Can be refrozen. Will make 40 to 50 punch cups. Will keep in freezer 2 or 3 months.

title: 122. ORANGE SLUSH PUNCH
info:
ORANGE SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 (6 oz.) boxes jello (orange)
2 c. sugar
2 c. boiling water
4 c. cold water
2 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
3 (1 qt.) 7-Up

preparation

Dissolve jello and sugar in boiling water. Add 4 cups cold water and 2 cans pineapple juice.

Divide into three (1/2 gallon) cleaned and empty paper milk containers and freeze. Remove from freezer 2 hours before serving. Add 1 quart of 7-Up for each 1/2 gallon. Stir until slushy and serve.

title: 192. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 (3 oz.) or 1 (6 oz.) pkg. jello
2 1/2 to 3 c. sugar
2 qt. hot water
1/2 c. lemon or lime juice
1 (46 oz.) can unsweetened pineapple juice
2 qt. cold ginger ale
2 qt. cold water
2 qt. 7-Up

preparation

Dissolve jello and sugar in hot water. Add lemon or lime juice, pineapple juice and cold water. Mix well and freeze (divide equally in two containers).

Before serving, thaw until mixture is a slushy consistency. Add cold ginger ale and 7-Up just before serving. Yields 50 servings.

By having the frozen mixture in two containers you can mix one at a time. (One container of frozen mixture, 1 quart ginger ale and 1 quart 7-Up.) This will fill punch bowl.

Note: Thaw frozen mixture at least two hours before serving.

title: 81. CRANBERRY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
CRANBERRY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 - 8 oz. cans jellied cranberry sauce
2 - 12 oz. cans frozen lemonade concentrate
1 - 12 oz can cranberry-apple juice concentrate
4 c. water
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ground allspice
12 c. lemon-lime soda, chilled

preparation

In a bowl, combine the cranberry sauce, concentrates, water, cinnamon and allspice. Cover and freeze for 8 hours or overnight. Remove from freezer 45 minutes before serving. For each serving, combine 1/2 c. slush mixture with 1/2 c. lemon-lime soda.

Makes 24 servings.

title: 291. FRUIT TEA PUNCH
info:
FRUIT TEA PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. sugar
1 c. cold water
2 c. strong tea
1 c. lemon juice
1 1/2 c. lemon juice
2 c. pineapple juice
1 gal. water
1 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Make a syrup of sugar and water in a large saucepan. Add tea, fruit juice and water (enough to make 1 1/2 gallons). Add ginger ale just before serving. May freeze all ingredients, except ginger ale. Serves 50.

title: 285. CRAN-GRAPE-TEA PUNCH
info:
CRAN-GRAPE-TEA PUNCH

ingredients

1 1/2 c. boiling water
2 family-size tea bags
10 whole cloves
2 cinnamon sticks
2 c. cranberry juice cocktail
1 1/2 c. unsweetened white grape juice
1/2 c. sugar

preparation

Pour boiling water over tea bags and spices; cover and let stand for 5 minutes. Remove tea bags, squeezing gently. Remove and discard spices. Add fruit juices and sugar; stir mixture until sugar dissolves. Serve hot or cold. Yield: 5 cups.

title: 78. BREAKFAST SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BREAKFAST SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3/4 c. sugar
1 1/4 c. water
3 c. pineapple juice
3 c. orange juice
3/4 c. lemon juice
1 large bottle ginger ale, chilled

preparation

Boil sugar and water. Add pineapple, orange and lemon juices. Freeze in containers. Set out about 1 hour before time to use. Place in punch bowl; pour chilled ginger ale over punch. Small slices of lime and lemon can be frozen in mixture. Accent with mint.

title: 247. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 large pkg. Jell-O (any flavor desired)
2 c. hot water
3 c. sugar
1 pt. Realemon juice
1 large can orange juice
9 c. water
2 Tbsp. vanilla
2 Tbsp. almond flavoring (if desired)
2 large bottles ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve Jell-O in hot water. Add remaining ingredients, mixing well. Freeze until firm overnight or all day. Serves 50.

title: 214. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 c. sugar
1 c. water
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (16 oz.) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed and undiluted
1 (48 oz.) bottle cran-raspberry juice drink
1 (2 liter) bottle ginger ale, chilled

preparation

Combine sugar and water in a saucepan; cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until sugar dissolves. Combine sugar mixture, pineapple juice and next 2 ingredients in a large container; freeze. Remove from freezer 1 hour before serving. Place in a punch bowl and break into chunks; add ginger ale. Stir until slushy. Yields 5 1/2 quarts.

title: 283. COLD TEA PUNCH
info:
COLD TEA PUNCH

ingredients

1 c. sugar
1 large can frozen orange juice
8 regular tea bags
1 (6 oz.) can lemonade
10 to 13 sprigs of mint (optional)

preparation

Steep tea. Mix other ingredients. Put in gallon container and finish filling with cold water.

title: 226. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (3 oz.) pkg. jello (your choice of flavor or color)
2 c. hot water
1 small can frozen lemonade
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 1/2 c. sugar
2 c. cold water
2 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve jello in hot water and add sugar. Stir in lemonade and cold water. Add pineapple juice. Pour into container and freeze. Thaw 2 hours before needed. Add ginger ale and mix in punch bowl. Makes 4 quarts or 64 cups.

title: 163. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 oz. pkg. jello
2 c. sugar
66 oz. water (11 (6 oz.) cups)
1 oz. almond extract (I don't use)
1 (46 oz.) pineapple juice
1 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Bring sugar and 2 cups water to boil. Add jello and allow to cool. Add the rest of the water, almond extract and pineapple juice. Mix well and freeze. Remove from the freezer 4 hours before serving. The mixture will become slushy. Do not thaw too much. Add ginger ale and serve.

title: 288. FRIENDSHIP TEA OR SPICED TEA
info:
FRIENDSHIP TEA OR SPICED TEA

ingredients

2 c. Tang
1 large pkg. lemonade mix
2 tsp. cinnamon
3/4 c. instant tea
1 c. sugar

preparation

Mix all together. Use 2 teaspoons to a cup of boiling water.

title: 207. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 1/2 c. sugar
4 c. water
3 to 5 ripe bananas
2 small cans frozen orange juice concentrate, mixed with water as called for on juice can
juice from 2 lemons or 4 Tbsp. ReaLemon
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
2 c. water

preparation

Heat sugar and water until dissolved. Cool. Blend bananas in blender. Add dissolved sugar water, blended bananas, mixed orange juice, lemon juice or ReaLemon, pineapple juice and water. Mix and freeze, stirring when about half frozen. Take from freezer; let set out short while. Then mix half and half with 7-Up in your blender. Serve.

title: 33. 50TH ANNIVERSARY PUNCH SLUSH
info:
50TH ANNIVERSARY PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

5 lb. sugar
3 large boxes lemon jello
4 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
2 large cans frozen lemonade
1 bottle almond extract
3 or 4 bottles 7-Up or Sprite

preparation

Freeze pineapple juice and set out about an hour before serving. Add all the ingredients together to make mixture (should be slush). Serves about 150.

title: 62. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
(For 75 Small Servings)

ingredients

1 (12 oz.) orange juice concentrate (thaw)
2 (6 oz.) cans frozen lemonade (thaw)
4 c. sugar (I use less sugar, very sweet)
8 c. water
5 bananas, mashed very fine

preparation

Heat sugar and water until sugar melts. Mix together all ingredients. Freezes 8 hours. Thaw 2 hours before serving. Add 2 quarts of ginger ale. (I have kept frozen longer.)

title: 162. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 pkg. strawberry jello
1 pkg. cherry jello
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 large can pineapple juice
1 can frozen limeade
1 can frozen lemonade
1 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve jello as directed on package. Add frozen limeade diluted to make 1 quart. Do the lemonade also the same way. Put in freezer and freeze. Just before serving add the ginger ale. May add ice cubes if you like.

title: 203. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 tea bags
2 c. sugar
12 oz. frozen lemonade
12 oz. frozen orange juice
2 c. bourbon (Optional)
8 c. water

preparation

Steep tea bags in 2 cups boiling water. Boil sugar in 6 cups of water and cool. Combine tea, sugar water, lemonade, and orange juice. Add bourbon. Mix and freeze 24 hours or serve with ice.

title: 204. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. sugar
1 lg. pkg. Strawberry Jell-O, or flavor of your choice
6 c. boiling water
2 lg. cans pineapple juice
2- 2- liter sprite or ginger ale

preparation

Mix together sugar, Jell-O and water, stir until dissolved, and add pineapple juice. Pour into containers and freeze for at least 24 hr. (Plastic milk jugs work well). Take out of freezer at least 1 hr. before using. Empty container into a large punch bowl; break mixture into chunks with a wooden spoon. Add sprite or ginger ale; mix to a slushy consistency. Makes a wonderful punch. Can add crushed pineapple or frozen strawberries when pouring in the pineapple juice.

title: 265. STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry jello
2 c. hot water
2 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid
2 c. sugar
1/2 c. lemon juice
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
4 1/2 qt. cold water

preparation

Dissolve jello in hot water. Add Kool-Aid, sugar, lemon juice, pineapple juice and water. Freeze. Remove from freezer 2 or 3 hours before serving and flake with a fork until slushy.

title: 255. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice concentrate
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade concentrate
1 large can pineapple juice (premade)
5 mashed, ripe bananas
2 c. water
1/2 c. sugar (omit, if desired)
2 liter bottles 7-Up or any uncola

preparation

Mix all but pop. Freeze thoroughly in large Tupperware container. Remove from freezer 1/2 hour before serving. Scoop or scrape into punch bowl as much as desired. Pour pop over and slightly mash with potato masher. Serve thick or thin. Add pop and scoop mixture as needed. Keeps in freezer for a few months. Just use leftovers as desired.

title: 253. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH
(Club Member: Amanda Speed)

ingredients

1 large frozen lemonade (12 oz.)
3 cans water
2 large bottles white grapefruit juice
2 c. sugar
1 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Use 1/2 water to melt lemonade. With other 1/2 water add to sugar in saucepan and heat to dissolve. Add to lemonade, then add juice. Put in large mouth container. Freeze to a slush. Add ginger ale when you start to serve.

title: 186. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 large pkg. Jell-O (use color you want)
6 c. cold water
6 oz. frozen lemonade
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
2 c. hot water
1 c. sugar
12 oz. can orange juice (frozen)
1 small bottle almond extract

preparation

Mix in a large bucket. Freeze until ready to use. Thaw partly and add 2 or 3 bottles of ginger ale to serve.

title: 136. PUNCH SLUSH
info:
PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

4 c. cranberry juice
7 c. water
2 c. sugar
12 oz. lemonade
6 oz. orange juice
a little red food coloring

preparation

Mix until sugar is dissolved. Freeze. When ready to serve, thaw to a slush. Add 7-Up.

title: 229. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 c. water
3 1/2 c. sugar
2 (3 oz.) pkg. gelatin
2/3 c. lemon juice
1 large can pineapple juice
1 (6 oz.) can orange juice
3 cans water
2 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Mix water and sugar. Bring to a boil and simmer 3 minutes. Remove from heat and add gelatin until dissolved. Mix remaining ingredients, except ginger ale. Freeze for at least 24 hours. Two hours before serving, take out of freezer. When ready to serve, break up with fork and add ginger ale. Any gelatin can be used to change colors.

title: 124. PARTY PUNCH (SLUSH)
info:
PARTY PUNCH (SLUSH)

ingredients

1 small box jello of choice
1 c. hot water
3 c. cold water
1 can pineapple juice (46 oz.)

preparation

Mix box of jello with hot water. Add cold water and pineapple juice. Freeze. Take out 1 hour before party. Add 1 liter ginger ale when thawed enough to stir. Stir again 15 minutes before served. Makes a slush.

title: 82. CRANBERRY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
CRANBERRY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 (8 oz.) cans jellied cranberry sauce
2 (12 oz.) cans lemonade concentrate
1 (12 oz.) can cranberry-apple juice concentrate
4 c. water
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ground allspice
12 c. lemon-lime soda, chilled

preparation

In a bowl, combine the cranberry sauce, concentrate, water, cinnamon and allspice. Cover and freeze for 8 hours or overnight. Remove from the freezer 45 minutes before serving.

For each serving, combine 1/2 cup slush mixture with 1/2 cup lemon-lime soda. Yield: 24 cup servings.

title: 25. MOETTE PUNCH (NON-ALCOHOLIC DRINK)
info:
MOETTE PUNCH (NON-ALCOHOLIC DRINK)
(8 Servings)

ingredients

1 c. pineapple juice
1 c. white grape juice
1 pt. club soda
sugar to taste
1 qt. raspberry sherbet or ice

preparation

Add soda to fruit juices; sweeten to taste. Pour into punch bowl; add scoops of sherbet.

title: 48. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 c. sugar
8 c. water
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (46 oz.) can orange juice
juice of 2 lemons or 1/4 c. juice
5 crushed bananas
ginger ale or Sprite

preparation

Boil sugar and water for 3 minutes, or until sugar is dissolved. Mix juice with sugar mixture. Add bananas. Freeze. When ready to use, chop up in a punch bowl. Add ginger ale or Sprite.

title: 191. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 1/2 c. frozen orange concentrate
1 (48 oz.) can unsweetened pineapple juice
3 c. water
3 blended bananas
1/4 c. lemon juice
1/2 c. sugar (optional)

preparation

Combine all ingredients and freeze in containers. Remove from freezer 1 hour before serving. Mix with 2 liters of 7-Up or Sprite and serve.

title: 251. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 large pkg. jello
2 c. hot water
3 c. cold water
2 c. sugar
2 cans pineapple juice
2 small cans frozen lemonade
3 bottles ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve jello and sugar in boiling water. Add cold water and juices. Freeze in containers. Add ginger ale when ready to use.

title: 71. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
juice of 2 lemons
2 c. frozen orange juice, diluted
5 mashed bananas (use a fork, not a blender)
8 c. water
4 c. sugar

preparation

Make a syrup using the water and sugar; bring to a rapid boil, then reduce heat and simmer 3 to 4 minutes. Set aside to cool thoroughly. When cooled, add other ingredients. Mix well and freeze. When ready to serve, add frozen mixture, after thawing to a slush, to equal amount of ginger ale, about 4 large bottles. Serves 50.

title: 132. PUNCH SLUSH
info:
PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

1 pkg. strawberry jello
1 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid
1 large can pineapple juice
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 c. boiling water
6 to 7 c. water
1 (10 oz.) bottle chilled 7-Up

preparation

Mix jello with 1 cup boiling water. Add sugar and Kool-Aid. Add rest of water, then add pineapple juice to make 1 gallon. Place in freezer about 8 hours before serving time. After 2 hours, start to stir mixture about every 45 minutes. Add 7-Up when ready to serve.

title: 59. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 c. sugar
6 c. water
1(46-oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (46-oz.) can orange juice
5 bananas, mashed
1/2 c. lemon juice
2 (2liter) lemon-lime sodas (Sprite)

preparation

Combine sugar and water in a saucepan, bring to a boil, stirring until sugar dissolves, cool. Pour mixture into large bowl, add the next four ingredients and freeze until firm. Remove from freezer several hours before serving (mixture should be slushy). Pour into punch bowl and stir in chilled soda. Yields approximately 2 1/2 gallons.

title: 77. BOURBON SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BOURBON SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (12 oz.) can orange juice concentrate
1 (12 oz.) can lemonade concentrate
7 c. water
1 c. strong tea
1 c. sugar
2 c. bourbon

preparation

Freeze 2 days and serve with 7-Up.

title: 119. NADA'S KOOL-AID SLUSH PUNCH
info:
NADA'S KOOL-AID SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 1/2 pt. boiling water
2 1/2 pt. cold water
2 1/2 c. sugar
1 pkg. Kool-Aid (any flavor)
1/2 can (46 oz.) orange juice
1/2 can (46 oz.) pineapple juice

preparation

Mix all the above and freeze; thaw to a slush and add 1 bottle of ginger ale before serving.

title: 58. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 c. sugar
6 c. water
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
2 (12 oz.) cans frozen orange juice
1 (12 oz.) frozen lemonade
1 (2 liter) Sprite, chilled
5 bananas

preparation

Dissolve sugar in water. Add pineapple juice, orange juice and lemonade. Mash bananas; blend in blender. Freeze. Add chilled Sprite to partially thawed punch. Serves 50.

title: 86. EDNA BROWN SLUSH PUNCH
info:
EDNA BROWN SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 c. sugar
4 c. water
4 pkg. (3 oz. size) strawberry Jell-O
6 oz. frozen lemonade
6 oz. frozen orange juice
46 oz. pineapple juice
1 qt. ginger ale, Sprite or 7-Up
1 oz. almond extract

preparation

Bring sugar and water to a boil or until sugar is dissolved. While hot (not boiling), add Jell-O. Cool. Add juices, one at a time. Mix well. Add 1 gallon water and almond extract. Makes 2 gallons.

title: 65. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 c. sugar
7 c. water
1 can pineapple juice (46 oz.)
1 can orange juice (46 oz.)
6 large bananas, mashed
1/2 c. lemon juice
2 (2 liters) 7-Up or Sprite

preparation

Dissolve sugar in water and bring to boil. Set aside and cool. Add other ingredients except for 7-Up or Sprite. Freeze in 2 one gallon freezer bags. Remove from freezer 1 to 2 hours before serving and let it partially thaw. Put in punch bowl and add 7-Up or Sprite. Serves 50 people.

title: 83. CRANBERRY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
CRANBERRY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 (8 oz.) cans jelled cranberry sauce
2 (12 oz.) cans lemonade concentrate
1 (12 oz.) can cranberry apple juice concentrate
4 c. water
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ground allspice
12 c. lemon-lime soda, chilled

preparation

In a bowl, combine the cranberry sauce concentrates, water, cinnamon and allspice. Cover and freeze for 8 hours or overnight. Remove from freezer 45 minutes before serving.

For each serving, combine 1/2 cup slush mixture with 1/2 cup lemon-lime soda. Makes 24 (1 cup) servings.

title: 39. BANANA PUNCH SLUSH
info:
BANANA PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

8 c. water
4 c. sugar
46 oz. pineapple juice
4 fresh lemons (juice)
2 small frozen orange juice
5 ripe bananas, mashed

preparation

Boil water and syrup for 5 minutes. Cool slightly. Add pineapple, lemons, orange juice and bananas. Mix, freeze overnight. Take out and mash with a potato masher. Pour 3 liters ginger ale over it. Serve.

title: 75. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 c. sugar
juice of 5 oranges
juice of 2 lemons
2 qt. 7-up
6 c. water
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
5 bananas, mashed

preparation

Mix sugar and water in a large pan and bring to a boil. Boil for 3 minutes and cool. Add juice of oranges, pineapple juice, and lemon juice. Mix well. Mix mashed bananas with other ingredients. Freeze. About 1 hour before serving, take out of freezer. Add approximately 2 quarts of 7 up. Will keep for months in the freezer.

title: 127. PARTY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
PARTY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 (6 oz.) frozen lemonade
3 (6 oz.) frozen limeade
46 oz. pineapple juice
46 oz. water
2 1/2 bottles ginger ale (28 oz. bottles)

preparation

Mix first 4 ingredients together and freeze in a wide mouth container. Let thaw 6 hours before serving. Use plastic wide mouth jugs. Tint with food coloring. Pour ginger ale over slush before serving (128 ounces equals 1 gallon).

title: 222. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 - 3 oz. pkg. strawberry Jell-O
4 C. boiling water
2 1/2 C. sugar
10 C. cold water
46 oz. can strawberry Hi-C drink
1 1/2 C. lemon juice
7 - UP

preparation

Dissolve Jell-O in the boiling water. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Add the cold water, Hi-C and lemon juice.

Freeze in large container.

When ready to serve; put 2 scoops in a glass and fill with 7-UP.

title: 287. DELICIOUS TEA/PUNCH
info:
DELICIOUS TEA/PUNCH

ingredients

1 gal. tea
1 bottle ginger ale
1 (6 oz.) frozen lemonade

preparation

Mix all. Serve.

title: 200. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (46 oz.) can unsweetened pineapple juice
1 pkg. unsweetened orange Kool-Aid
2 pkg. unsweetened strawberry Kool-Aid
2 qt. water
3 c. sugar
1/3 c. ReaLemon
3 c. mashed bananas (use blender)
1 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Mix all ingredients in order listed, except ginger ale. Freeze. Thaw approximately 5 hours before serving time. Pour 1 quart ginger ale over punch mixture; stir well. Serves 50.

title: 282. CITRUS-TEA PUNCH
info:
CITRUS-TEA PUNCH

ingredients

1 1/2 c. water
1 tea bag
1 1/2 c. orange juice
1 1/2 c. pineapple juice
1/2 c. lemon juice
1 c. sugar
3 c. ginger ale, chilled
orange and lemon slices (optional)
lemon rind strips (optional)
mint leaves (optional)

preparation

Bring water to a boil in a large saucepan; add tea bag. Remove from heat, cover and let stand 5 minutes. Remove tea bag. Add fruit juices and sugar, stirring until sugar dissolves. Chill. Stir in ginger ale just before serving. Add orange and lemon slices and lemon rind strips and mint, if desired. Yield: 2 quarts.

title: 43. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 cups sugar
6 cups water
1 46 oz. can pineapple juice
1 46 oz. can orange juice
5 mashed bananas
1/2 cup lemon juice
5 quarts ginger ale

preparation

Combine sugar and water in saucepan. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and cool. Pour mixture into a 5 quart freezer container. Stir in pineapple juice, orange juice, bananas and lemon juice. Freeze until firm. Remove mixture from freezer several hours before serving. Should be slushy. Pour into punch bowl and stir in ginger ale.

title: 80. CITRUS SLUSH PUNCH
info:
CITRUS SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 1/2 c. sugar
3 c. water
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
3 c. cold water
4 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Bring sugar and 3 cups water to a boil, stirring until sugar dissolves. Remove from heat. Stir in frozen juices until melted. Stir in pineapple juice and 3 cups cold water. Pour into 2 (9 x 13) pans, cover and freeze at least overnight. Cut each pan of frozen punch into 24 squares. Place in freezer bags and store in freezer until ready to use. Makes 2 gallons.

To Serve: Put squares into punch bowl and slowly pour in ginger ale. Mix to a slush.

title: 180. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 small pkg. any flavor Jell-O (you may change flavors to obtain desired color)
9 c. boiling water
4 c. sugar
2 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
16 oz. bottle lemon juice
4 c. cold water
2 qt. (liters) ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve Jell-O in boiling water. Add sugar, pineapple juice, lemon juice and cold water. Mix well and freeze for 2 to 7 days. Remove punch from freezer approximately 8 hours before time to serve. When ready to serve, mix partially frozen mixture with ginger ale.

title: 176. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 c. sugar
4 c. water
2 (32 oz.) cans unsweetened pineapple juice
1 gal. cold water
1 (8 oz.) jar ReaLemon juice
1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice (undiluted)
1 1/2 oz. almond flavoring
2 large pkg. lemon Jell-O

preparation

Mix sugar and water; bring to a boil; add Jell-O, dissolve. Add other ingredients. Freeze. Thaw to a slush before serving. Yields 2 gallons.

To make 3 gallons, add 2 cans of unsweetened orange juice.

title: 197. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 large can pineapple juice
1 large (46 oz.) strawberry Jell-O
1 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid
2 c. boiling water
2 c. sugar
6 c. cold water
2 liter ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve Kool-Aid, jello and sugar in boiling water. Add cold water and pineapple juice. Freeze 4 to 6 hours until it becomes slush. Put in punch bowl and add ginger ale. Serves 20.

title: 55. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 c. sugar
4 c. water
5 ripe bananas, mashed
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (46 oz.) can orange juice

preparation

Mix sugar and water until dissolved. Add juice and mashed bananas. Freeze in large container (can make ahead of time). Thaw 2 to 3 hours before serving. Mix up to 6 bottles of ginger ale. Punch should be slushy.

title: 89. FROZEN SLUSH PUNCH
info:
FROZEN SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 c. water
2 c. sugar
3 ripe bananas
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 can water
4 Tbsp. real lemon juice
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
6 (16 oz.) bottles 7-Up

preparation

Mix water and sugar. Boil for 5 minutes and cool. Mash bananas. Add remaining ingredients. Freeze in three 1/2-gallon cartons. Remove from freezer 2 hours before serving and cut through with knife to break up. Place one carton in punch bowl and pour 2 (16 ounce) bottles of 7-Up over it.

title: 147. SLUSH FRUIT PUNCH
info:
SLUSH FRUIT PUNCH

ingredients

6 oz. pkg. red jello
2 c. sugar
4 c. boiling water
46 oz. can unsweetened pineapple juice
12 oz. frozen lemonade
2 1/2 c. water
2 liter Sprite

preparation

Mix jello and sugar; add boiling water and stir until jello is dissolved. Add lemonade and water. Place mixture in a container suitable for freezing. When ready to serve, allow to thaw about 4 hours. Add Sprite.

title: 150. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 boxes regular Jell-O (any flavor you want)
3 c. boiling water
3 c. sugar
1 large can pineapple juice
1 small concentrate orange juice
1 small concentrate lemonade

preparation

Combine Jell-O, water and sugar; stir until dissolved. Add pineapple juice, orange juice and lemonade. In 1 gallon jar, mix all ingredients. Pour half into another gallon jar. Fill with 1/2 gallon water. Put in freezer 24 to 48 hours before serving. Pour in 1 gallon punch bowl and add 1 quart ginger ale (1 quart ginger ale per gallon).

title: 53. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

5 c. water
2 c. sugar
2 small cans lemonade (frozen)
2 small cans orange juice (frozen)
1 large can pineapple juice
7 bananas
1 bottle 7-Up or up to 5 bottles if more is needed

preparation

Mix water and sugar in large container until sugar dissolves (overnight if need be). Add frozen lemonade and orange juice. Add pineapple juice. Put bananas through blender. Mix all these ingredients together and freeze. Remove from freezer; mash with potato masher to slush up. Add cold 7-Up (or Bubble-Up), 1 bottle, or up to 5 bottles if needed.

title: 202. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (3 oz.) pkg. any flavor gelatin
2 c. sugar
3 c. boiling water
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade concentrate
1 Tbsp. almond extract
5 c. cold water

preparation

Dissolve gelatin and sugar in boiling water in bowl. Combine gelatin mixture with pineapple juice, lemonade concentrate, almond extract and cold water in large freezer container. Freeze for 3 to 4 days. Let thaw for 6 hours before serving; stir. Pour into punch bowl; ladle into punch cups. Yield: 20 servings.

title: 269. STRAWBERRY-BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
STRAWBERRY-BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. sugar
6 c. water
2 pkg. frozen strawberries, thawed
1 large can pineapple juice
juice of 5 lemons or 1 large can frozen lemonade
juice of 5 oranges or 1 large can frozen orange juice
5 ripe bananas, mashed

preparation

Mix together and freeze in containers. (This recipe serves 50.) When serving this many, add 4 quarts of strawberry soda. The slush should be removed from the freezer 3 hours before adding the soda in order for it to slush and flavor the drink. When serving a smaller number of people, use less of the slush and less of the soda.

title: 28. STRAWBERRY TEA SLUSH
info:
STRAWBERRY TEA SLUSH

ingredients

2 c. boiling Water
4 Tea Bags, regular size
1 1/2 c. frozen Strawberries
1 (6 oz.) can frozen Lemonade concentrate
1 c. Ice Cubes
1/4 c. Powdered Sugar

preparation

Pour 2 cups boiling water over tea bags. Cover and steep 5 min. Remove tea bags. Chill at least 1 hour. Process chilled tea, frozen strawberries, and remaining ingredients in a blender until smooth and slushy. Serve immediately.

title: 20. FRUIT PUNCH DRINK
info:
FRUIT PUNCH DRINK

ingredients

1 c. ice
2 oz. orange juice
1 oz. apple juice
1 oz. diet 7-Up

preparation

Blend in blender. Each serving contains 55 calories.

title: 276. ZOLA'S SLUSH PUNCH
info:
ZOLA'S SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. sugar
6 c. water
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries
1 large can frozen lemonade
1 large can frozen orange juice
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
5 mashed bananas
2 (2 liter) bottles strawberry soda pop

preparation

Melt sugar in boiling water (to make syrup) and let cool. In large bowl, combine syrup and all ingredients except soda pop. Mix well and freeze. (Ziploc freezer bags work well.) When ready to serve, place frozen mixture in punch bowl and pour strawberry soda pop over to break it up. Will be ready to serve in 20 to 30 minutes. Drowns 25, serves 30 to 50.

title: 223. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 pkg. strawberry Jell-O
1 pkg. cherry Jell-O
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 large can pineapple juice
1 can frozen limeade
1 can frozen lemonade
1 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve gelatins as directed on package. Mix frozen limeade and lemonade in 1 quart of water. Add to gelatin mixture along with pineapple juice. Freeze, stirring frequently. Just before serving, add ginger ale and ice cubes, if needed. Serves about 50.

title: 112. JELLO SLUSH PUNCH
info:
JELLO SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (3 oz.) pkg. jello (strawberry, banana or orange)
1/2 c. sugar
1 large can pineapple juice
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Mix jello and add sugar, juice and pineapple juice. Freeze in ice cube trays. When ready, add frozen cubes and "cold" ginger ale in punch bowl. Mix or stir to slush.

title: 60. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

5 ripe bananas, liquefied
4 c. sugar
6 c. water
1 (46 oz.) unsweetened orange juice
1 (46 oz.) pineapple juice

preparation

Mix all together and freeze until icy. (Takes about 1 full day.) Before serving, add 2 quarts (two 2 liter bottles) of 7-Up.

title: 111. JELLO OPEN HOUSE PUNCH-SLUSH
info:
JELLO OPEN HOUSE PUNCH-SLUSH

ingredients

2 large Jell-O (orange)
4-1/2 c. sugar
5 c. water
1 bottle almond extract (1 oz.)
1 (12 oz.) frozen orange juice, undiluted
1 (6 oz.) frozen lemonade, undiluted
2 (46 oz.) cans unsweetened pineapple juice
1 gal. water
Canada Dry Ginger Ale

preparation

Bring water and sugar to boil. Turn off heat and add Jell-O and stir until dissolved. Add extract, 1 gallon water, and all juices. Blend together. Put into 1/2 gallon containers and freeze. Before serving, let thaw until you can cut it with a knife. Cut in bowl until slush. Add ginger ale to slush and serve. Makes 3 gallons of frozen base. Ginger ale not included. Yield: approximately 75 servings.

title: 41. BANANA SLUSH (FROZEN PUNCH)
info:
BANANA SLUSH (FROZEN PUNCH)

ingredients

4 c. sugar
6 c. water
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice, undiluted
5 mashed bananas
4 qt. 7-Up or ginger ale

preparation

Heat water and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Add juices and mashed bananas. Mix well. Freeze at least overnight or until needed. Remove from freezer 1 hour prior to serving. Cut up in punch bowl and add 7-Up or ginger ale. Serves approximately 50.

title: 96. FRUIT PUNCH SLUSH
info:
FRUIT PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

3 c. sugar
4 1/2 c. water
42 oz. pineapple juice
3 sliced bananas
1 (16 oz.) can crushed pineapple
3 (21 oz.) bottles ginger ale
juice and pulp of 5 oranges
juice and pulp of 2 lemons

preparation

Boil water and sugar 5 minutes. Set aside. Combine in blender lemons, pineapple, oranges and bananas. Leave chunky. Add to boiled sugar mixture. Add bottled ginger ale and pineapple juice, freeze. Remove from freezer 3 to 4 hours before ready to serve. Keep pouring the remaining 2 bottles of ginger ale all over the punch while serving.

title: 79. CITRUS SLUSH PUNCH
info:
CITRUS SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

5 medium bananas
1 (6 oz.) can lemonade concentrate, thawed
1 (12 oz.) can orange juice concentrate, thawed
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice (unsweetened)
6 c. water
1 (32 oz.) bottle lemon-lime soda
1 (32 oz.) bottle club soda

preparation

In blender, combine bananas, lemonade concentrate and orange concentrate; blend for 1 minute or until smooth. (If blender is unavailable, combine ingredients in large mixing bowl and beat with electric mixer.) Pour into large container (1 gallon size); add pineapple juice and water. Freeze overnight. (May be frozen up to 6 months.)

title: 256. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 (12 oz.) cans frozen lemonade
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
3 c. sugar
4 tea bags
6 c. hot water
14 c. water
2 c. bourbon or whiskey

preparation

Steep tea bags in 6 cups hot water for 10 minutes. Add remaining ingredients and freeze about 10 hours.

title: 73. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 c. sugar
6 c. water
1 qt. pineapple juice or 46 oz.
2 1/2 c. orange juice (3 small cans)
7 Tbsp. lemon juice (ReaLemon)
5 to 6 bananas, sliced (dip in lemon juice)
red cherries
3 qt. 7-Up

preparation

Mix sugar in water; boil until dissolved, then cool. Add pineapple juice, orange juice, lemon juice, bananas and cherries. Freeze all this together until ready to use. Add 7-Up and let thaw until slushy.

title: 155. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 oz. lime jello
3 oz. lemon jello
juice from 1 lemon
1 c. sugar
1 large pineapple juice
7-Up

preparation

Dissolve jello with boiling water (1 1/2 to 2 cups). Add all ingredients. Freeze. When ready to serve, thaw partially. Take out of freezer at least 2 hours prior to serving. Add 1 to 1 1/2 liter 7-Up.

title: 133. PUNCH SLUSH
info:
PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

1 (12 oz.) can orange juice concentrate
1 (6 oz.) can lemonade concentrate
1 c. sugar
2 c. strong tea
7 c. water

preparation

Mix and freeze. Scrape with ice cream scoop. Add to any clear beverage for a refreshing drink.

title: 149. SLUSH PARTY PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PARTY PUNCH

ingredients

5 c. sugar
4 c. water
4 small boxes jello (strawberry or your choice)
1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 gal. water
1 tsp. almond extract
bananas (optional), blended in blender

preparation

Bring sugar and water to boil; add jello and mix well. Cool, then add frozen orange juice and large can of pineapple juice, water and extract. Freeze.

When ready to serve, take out of freezer about 3 hours before ready to use. Pour into punch bowl and add bottle of ginger ale. Makes 2 gallons. Serves 100.

title: 118. LO-CAL PUNCH STRAWBERRY SLUSH
info:
LO-CAL PUNCH STRAWBERRY SLUSH

ingredients

1 c. slightly thawed frozen strawberries
1/2 c. pineapple juice
Cool Whip

preparation

In blender, puree strawberries with 1/4 cup pineapple juice. Add Cool Whip.

title: 146. SLUSH AID PUNCH
info:
SLUSH AID PUNCH

ingredients

3 small pkg. jello (any flavor)
9 c. boiling water
4 c. sugar
2 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
4 c. water
1 (7.5 oz.) frozen lemon juice
1 to 2 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve jello in water. Add next four ingredients and mix well. Freeze in plastic containers. Take out of freezer at least an hour before serving so that it can thaw to a slush. Add ginger ale. Serves 50. Also makes a great rum punch.

title: 143. RED PUNCH SLUSH
info:
RED PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

1 1/2 c. water
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/4 to 1/2 c. cinnamon candies
6 lemons (juice) or 2 Tbsp. ReaLemon per lemon
8 oranges (juice)
1 qt. cranberry juice
1 qt. pineapple juice
2 qt. club soda

preparation

Boil water, sugar and cinnamon candies for 5 minutes. Stir to dissolve cinnamon candies. Cool. Add the juice from the oranges and lemons. Mix cranberry and pineapple juices. Freeze in two 1/2 gallon cartons.

Thaw for 1 hour before serving. Chop until mixture becomes slushy. Add 2 quarts of club soda and serve. Great punch for Christmas!

title: 266. STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 pkg. frozen strawberries
3 large (12 oz.) cans frozen orange juice
3 (48 oz.) cans pineapple juice
1/2 small bottle vanilla extract
1/2 small bottle almond extract
3 large bottles ginger ale
3 c. sugar
2 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid

preparation

Combine strawberries, orange juice and pineapple juice. Add enough water to make 3 gallons. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well and combine all. Put in freezer. Serves approximately 100.

title: 30. TEA BRANDY SLUSH
info:
TEA BRANDY SLUSH

ingredients

8 to 9 c. boiling water
4 tea bags, steeped in water 5 to 10 minutes
2 c. sugar, dissolved in tea
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade
2 c. brandy

preparation

Mix all ingredients in ice cream bucket or large container. Store in freezer for 24 hours before serving. Scoop out about 3/4 serving per glass, filling the remainder of the glass with white soda. Garnish with a stem cherry.

title: 92. FRUIT PUNCH SLUSH
info:
FRUIT PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

1 (8 oz.) can frozen fruit punch
4 oz. water
1 pt. strawberry Bullet
7-Up

preparation

Mix fruit punch, water and strawberry Bullet in large container and freeze. When frozen, scoop into glass and mix half and half with 7-Up.

title: 84. CRANBERRY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
CRANBERRY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

5 c. cranberry juice
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade concentrate
4 c. 7-Up
2 c. ginger ale

preparation

Mix all ingredients. Can be frozen.

title: 290. FRUIT TEA PUNCH
info:
FRUIT TEA PUNCH

ingredients

1/4 c. tea
10 c. boiling water
1 c. sugar
1 c. water
2 c. grapefruit juice
1 c. lemon juice
2 c. pineapple juice

preparation

Pour boiling water over tea leaves and let stand. Make a syrup by boiling the sugar and water until clear. Add other ingredients. Pour over ice and serve. Grape juice may be used instead of the grapefruit juice. Serves 25 people.

title: 293. FRUIT TEA PUNCH
info:
FRUIT TEA PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. boiling water
4 tea bags black tea
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 c. orange juice
1 Tbsp. honey
1 lemon
2 oranges
2 c. fresh strawberries
1 bottle soda water

preparation

Pour boiling water over tea bags; steep 3 minutes. Remove tea bags. Blend in juices; sweeten with honey. Wash, hull and cut in half the strawberries. Add to tea. Cover. Refrigerate punch at least 6 hours to blend flavors. Just before serving, add bottle of soda water. Yield: about 10 cups.

title: 129. PUNCH (FROZEN SLUSH)
info:
PUNCH (FROZEN SLUSH)

ingredients

1 large box jello (determines color and flavor)
2 c. hot water
6 c. cold water
1 (12 oz.) frozen orange juice
1 (12 oz.) frozen lemonade
1 (64 oz.) pineapple juice
1 large (2 liter) pop (Vernors, 7-Up, Sprite, etc.)

preparation

Stir hot water into jello until dissolved. Add cold water, orange juice, lemonade, pineapple juice and pop.

Mix and freeze ingredients in containers of 5 pounds. Take out 4 hours before serving. Crush into chunks. Add pop. Yields 30 servings in punch size cups.

title: 189. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 (3 oz.) boxes any flavor gelatin
4 c. boiling water
12 c. cold water
2 (46 oz. each) cans pineapple juice
3 c. sugar
4 bottles ginger ale

preparation

I use a dishpan to mix all the ingredients. Add boiling water to gelatin and stir to dissolve. Add cold water and stir. Add pineapple juice and sugar; stir. Put in freezer Baggies and freeze. You can make this punch up a week before you need it. Take out of freezer about 5 to 6 hours before serving. Add ginger ale to your taste.

title: 240. SLUSH PUNCH
info: SLUSH PUNCH

title: 51. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 qt. water
6 to 8 mashed bananas
3 small cans lemonade (frozen)
1 large can pineapple juice
3 c. sugar
2 small cans orange juice (frozen)
3 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Heat water and sugar until sugar dissolves, stirring constantly; cool. Add all other ingredients in a large bowl; stir and freeze in containers. When ready to serve, take out a container of punch and pour ginger ale on top a little at a time. Break up with a potato masher until slushy and serve in a punch bowl.

title: 109. HOLIDAY PUNCH (SLUSH)
info:
HOLIDAY PUNCH (SLUSH)

ingredients

1 (12 oz.) can cranberry juice cocktail (frozen)
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 c. powdered sugar
3 (2 liter) bottles Squirt
fifth of gin

preparation

Thaw juices. Mix juices and powdered sugar together in a blender until mixed. Pour in large container. Add Squirt and gin. Mix well. Freeze for 24 hours. Thaw for 1/2 hour before serving.

title: 67. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 pkg. Kool-Aid punch (any flavor)
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
30 oz. 7-Up or Sprite (can use more to taste)
3 large bananas, mashed
2 c. sugar
juice of 1 lemon
2 1/2 qt. water

preparation

Mix well and freeze. Let slush before serving. "Great hit."

title: 68. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 bananas
juice of 3 lemons
6 c. water
4 c. sugar
1 qt. pineapple juice
juice of 5 oranges (1/2 to 1 c.)
4 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Chill all ingredients together thoroughly except ginger ale. Just before serving, add ginger ale that has been chilled. Serves 50.

Note: This is better if frozen and allowed to thaw just enough to make a slush. Cool and refreshing. This is the recipe I used for Jill and Jackie's showers.

title: 52. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 c. hot water
4 c. sugar
1 large can pineapple juice
2 (12 oz.) cans frozen orange juice, thawed and undiluted
6 ripe bananas, blended in blender
3 (2 liter) bottles ginger ale or lemon-lime soda

preparation

Dissolve sugar in hot water. Add pineapple juice, orange juice, lemonade and blended bananas. Freeze mixture in 3 large containers. Take out of freezer 2 hours before serving. For each container of punch mixture, add 1 cold bottle ginger ale or lemon-lime soda. Serve while slushy. Serves 72.

title: 32. "SLUSH" BOURBON PUNCH
info:
"SLUSH" BOURBON PUNCH

ingredients

3 tea bags
2 c. water
2 c. sugar
12 oz. lemonade concentrate (frozen)
6 oz. frozen orange juice concentrate (frozen)
7 c. water
2 c. (1/2 liter) bourbon

preparation

Boil the 2 cups of water and tea bags for 3 minutes; remove from heat and add remaining ingredients. Stir together and freeze 12 to 24 hours. Remove from freezer approximately 1 hour prior to serving. Serve as slushy. Enjoy!

title: 300. GOLDEN TEA PUNCH
info:
GOLDEN TEA PUNCH

ingredients

16 family-size tea bags
1 1/2 qt. (6 c.) boiling water
1 c. sugar
1 c. water
2 (16 oz.) cans frozen lemonade (undiluted)
1 (16 oz.) can frozen orange juice (undiluted)
2 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
2 (33 oz.) bottles ginger ale, chilled

preparation

Brew tea for about 5 minutes, using tea bags and boiling water. Remove tea bags and set aside. To make sugar syrup, combine sugar and 1 cup water in small saucepan. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and set aside.

In a large pot or bowl, combine tea, sugar syrup, lemonade, orange juice and pineapple juice. Chill well. Just before serving, add ginger ale and mix. Serve over ice. Serves 40.

title: 153. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. granulated sugar
1 (6 oz.) pkg. flavored gelatin (can select desired flavor or color)
6 c. boiling water
2 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
4 (1 liter) bottles ginger ale, chilled

preparation

In a 6 quart container, combine sugar and gelatin powder. Add boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Add pineapple juice; mix. Pour into plastic containers and freeze at least 24 hours.

Approximately 1 hour before desired serving time, set containers out to thaw slightly. Place mixture in punch bowl, breaking it into chunks. Add ginger ale. Mix to where is slushy. Makes approximately 70 (1/2 cup) servings.

title: 130. PUNCH - SLUSH
info:
PUNCH - SLUSH

ingredients

2 (3 oz.) pkg. Jell-O (orange)
2 c. boiling water
4 c. cold water
2 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
2 c. sugar
3 qt. 7-Up

preparation

Dissolve Jell-O in boiling water. Combine cold water, pineapple juice, sugar and Jell-O. Place in 5-quart pails. Cover and freeze for at least 48 hours.

Two hours before serving, take out and thaw. When serving, add 7-Up.

For red, use red Jell-O and cranberry juice.

title: 185. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 small pkg. Kool-Aid
1 small box Jell-O
2 c. sugar

preparation

Dissolve all ingredients in hot water; add to 1 large unsweetened pineapple juice in a gallon container; finish with water. Freeze to slush and serve with vanilla ice milk.

title: 90. FROZEN SLUSH PUNCH
info:
FROZEN SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 (6 oz.) pkg. Jell-O (any flavor)
9 c. boiling water
4 c. water
4 c. sugar
2 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
1 (16 oz.) bottle lemon juice
4 bottles ginger ale

preparation

Mix Jell-O (flavor of Jell-O for color of punch) with boiling water in large container. Cool. Bring 4 cups of water and 4 cups of sugar to a boil in a saucepan. Cool and add to Jell-O mixture. Pour in pineapple juice and lemon juice and stir well. Pour into 2 gallon plastic milk containers and freeze. Thaw for 4 hours. Cut top off plastic milk containers and pour into large punch bowl. Slush and add 2 bottles of ginger ale to each gallon of punch.

title: 239. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (3 oz.) pkg. Jell-O (whatever flavor you want)
4 c. boiling water
2 c. sugar
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice

preparation

Mix all and freeze. Take out of freezer 2 hours before serving at room temperature. Add 2 quarts of ginger ale slowly just before serving. Should be slushy.

title: 211. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

12 oz. pineapple juice
12 oz. frozen orange juice
4 pkg. cherry Kool-Aid
12 oz. frozen lemonade concentrate
2 qt. water
6 qt. 7-Up

preparation

Mix the first 5 ingredients and freeze. When ready to serve, put in punch bowl and add the 7-Up. This recipe makes 75 servings.

title: 184. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 large pkg. lime jello (use any flavor depending on color you wish)
4 c. cold water
2 liters 7-Up or ginger ale
1 1/2 c. sugar
2 c. boiling water
1 can pineapple juice

preparation

Dissolve jello in 2 cups boiling water. Add sugar, cold water and pineapple juice. Freeze in gallon size Ziploc freezer bags. Thaw 1 hour before serving. Add 7-Up and more pineapple juice, if desired. Makes 30 (1/2 cup) servings.

title: 169. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 large pkg. Jell-O
3 1/2 c. sugar
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (46 oz.) can orange juice
water
ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve Jell-O in 4 cups boiling water. Add sugar with 8 cups water and boil 3 minutes. Add pineapple and orange juice. Freeze. Thaw 2 1/2 hours before serving. Add 2 quarts of ginger ale to each gallon. (Add 2 packages of Kool-Aid, same flavor as Jell-O used, to make a richer and deeper color, if desired.)

title: 254. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

12 oz. can orange juice
6 oz. can lemonade
46 oz. can pineapple juice
2 liters Sprite
4 c. water

preparation

Mix, serve over ice or freeze to make slush. If frozen, add chilled Sprite when ready to serve.

title: 171. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 pkg. strawberry Jell-O
1 pkg. orange Kool-Aid
2 c. hot water
2 c. sugar
1 large can unsweetened pineapple juice
2 qt. cold water
6 Tbsp. lemon juice

preparation

Dissolve Jell-O in hot water, then add other ingredients, stirring as you add them. Set in freezer for approximately 8 to 9 hours. Stir hourly after the first 4 hours. This recipe makes 1 gallon and 8 gallons serves 150 people.

title: 173. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

5 ripe bananas
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade
2 (12 oz.) cans frozen orange juice
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
6 c. water
ginger ale
4 c. sugar

preparation

Bring to boil water and sugar to make a simple syrup. Cool. Mix all ingredients except ginger ale and freeze in 3 half gallon milk cartons. When ready to serve, mix with ginger ale in punch bowl (1 milk carton of punch mixture to 2 or 3 tall bottles ginger ale). Can be made ahead and used as needed.

title: 201. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 large pkg. Jell-O (lemon or strawberry)
2 c. sugar
2 c. boiling water
1 c. pineapple juice

preparation

Mix Jell-O and water. Add sugar and stir well. Add juice and enough water to equal one gallon. Freeze to make slush. Shake occasionally to make a slush.

title: 107. GALA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
GALA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 medium grapefruit, peeled and cut into pieces
1 (67.6 oz.) bottle lemon-lime carbonated beverage
1/4 c. sugar
1 pt. lime sherbet
1 pt. pineapple sherbet

preparation

In a blender or food processor, place half of the cut up grapefruit. Cover and process until nearly smooth; strain into a large bowl. Repeat with remaining grapefruit. Add half of the carbonated beverage (about 4 cups) to the grapefruit juice. Stir in the sugar until dissolved. Pour into a 9 x 9 x 2-inch pan. Cover and freeze 4 to 5 hours or until nearly firm, stirring 3 times during the freezing time.

To serve, spoon sherbet and grapefruit mixture into a punch bowl. Pour in remaining carbonated beverage. Serve immediately. Makes 16 (1-cup) servings.

title: 47. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice (thaw)
1 (48 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 c. lemon juice
5 bananas, crushed
6 c. water
4 c. sugar
3 (2 liter) 7-Up

preparation

Blend and freeze first 6 ingredients solid. Remove from freezer 1 hour before using. Chop up and pour 7-Up over. Serve. Yield: 2 punch bowls full.

title: 125. PARTY PUNCH SLUSH
info:
PARTY PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

6 c. water
3 c. sugar
46 oz. can pineapple juice
12 oz. can frozen orange juice
12 oz. can frozen lemonade
5 mashed bananas

preparation

Mix together the water and sugar; boil 3 minutes. Add the remaining ingredients; mix together and freeze (large plastic bags or plastic freezer container).

To serve: Add equal amounts of frozen mixture with 7-Up. Can keep unused frozen mixture for weeks.

title: 194. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 c. sugar
4 c. water
2 qt. pineapple juice
2 pkg. Kool-Aid (whatever color)
1 can frozen lemonade

preparation

Boil sugar and water together until clear. Mix together in large container and freeze. Stir occasionally. Serves about 30 people.

title: 298. GINGER TEA PUNCH
info:
GINGER TEA PUNCH

ingredients

8 single-serving-size tea bags
1 (1 to 2-inch) piece fresh ginger, thinly sliced
2 to 4 Tbsp. sugar
2 (12 oz.) bottles or cans ginger ale, chilled
1 orange, halved lengthwise and thinly sliced (optional)

preparation

Place tea bags and ginger in a tea pot. Add 4 1/2 cups boiling water. Cover; let steep 3 to 5 minutes or until desired strength. Remove tea bags. Stir in sugar. Cool at room temperature 2 hours. Cover and chill until ready to serve.

To serve, pour tea mixture through a strainer into a 2-quart pitcher. Add ginger ale. Pour over ice in tall glasses. If desired, garnish with orange. Makes 8 (8-ounce) servings.

Make-Ahead Tip: Brew tea as directed. Cover and chill for up to 8 hours. Serve as directed.

title: 57. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 bananas, sliced
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice concentrate
2 c. sugar
1 large pineapple juice
2 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Combine bananas and a small amount of orange juice in blender container. Process until smooth. Mix with 6 cups water and remaining ingredients except ginger ale in freezer container. Store in freezer until ready to use. Thaw until slushy. Add ginger ale just before serving time. Yields 5 quarts.

title: 131. PUNCH SLUSH
info:
PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

2 (3 oz.) pkgs. flavored gelatin (strawberry is good)
2 c. sugar
2 c. hot water
2 c. cold water
2 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
2 liter Sprite
1 pkg. Kool-aide (same flavor as jello)
1 pkg. jello
1 c. sugar
2 c. hot water
2 c. cold water

preparation

Mix until everything dissolves. Pour into styrofoam cups, and place in freezer until frozen. Eat with a spoon.

title: 179. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

9 c. water
3 1/2 c. sugar
2 small pkg. jello (flavor and color of choice)
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 qt. fresh orange juice
5 lemons juiced (10 Tbsp.)
2 large ginger ale

preparation

Boil water and sugar together for three minutes. Add remaining ingredients except ginger ale. Freeze. Remove 2 hours before serving and add 3 large ginger ales after punch has been slushed with potato masher. Serves 36.

title: 105. FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH
info:
FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 (46 oz.) cans unsweetened pineapple juice
4 c. pina colada mixer
4 c. sugar
4 c. tropical punch
3 liters 7-Up or ginger ale

preparation

In a large container, combine the first four ingredients. Stir until the sugar is dissolved. Pour into containers and freeze.

About 1 1/2 to 2 hours before party, remove from freezer and allow to thaw slightly. Slush it with a knife. Just before serving, add 7-Up or ginger ale. (Amount of soda can vary according to preference. Makes 2 1/2 gallons without 7-Up.)

Note: If you want an old rose color, add 2 cups of grape juice to recipe.

title: 221. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 pkg. Jello
1 c. hot water
2 c. sugar
2 qt. water
1 large can pineapple juice
1 can lemon aid

preparation

Mix together. Freeze for three days. When ready to serve, thaw 3 hours then add 2 liters of 7-UP or Sprite.

title: 198. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 c. sugar
11 c. water
1 large pkg. jello (whatever flavor and color you like)
1 large can unsweetened pineapple juice
1 large frozen orange juice, undiluted
1/2 c. lemon juice

preparation

Boil sugar and water for 3 minutes. Add jello and juices. Stir. Pour into milk cartons and freeze. Use 3 liters ginger ale per run of punch. Makes 44 punch cups per run. Thaw 2 hours or longer before adding ginger ale to serve.

title: 286. CRANBERRY TEA PUNCH
info:
CRANBERRY TEA PUNCH

ingredients

4 tea bags
2 c. boiling water
6 c. water
1 c. sugar
1 qt. (4 c.) cranberry juice cocktail, chilled
2 c. apple juice, chilled
6 oz. can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
orange slices (if desired)
ice ring (if desired)

preparation

Prepare tea by combining bags with 2 cups boiling water. Allow to steep 10 minutes; remove tea bags. Cool to room temperature and refrigerate.

Meanwhile, in medium saucepan, bring 6 cups water and sugar to boil, stirring constantly until sugar is dissolved. Cool to room temperature; refrigerate. Just before serving, combine chilled tea, sugar mixture, orange juice concentrate, cranberry juice and apple juice in large punch bowl. Garnish with orange slices and ice ring. Yield: 30 (1/2 cup) servings. Calories per 1/2 cup serving: 70.

title: 101. FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH
info:
FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 c. sugar
6 c. water
5 bananas
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade
2 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Heat sugar and water until sugar is dissolved; cool. Blend bananas in blender. Add a little of the pineapple juice. Combine banana mixture, remaining pineapple juice, orange juice and lemonade; freeze in 1/2-gallon containers. (I use Ziploc Baggies.)

When ready to use, thaw slightly. Put in punch bowl and add a little ginger ale. Mash with a potato masher until slushy. Add remaining ginger ale.

Great to make ahead and have when needed.

title: 294. FRUIT TEA PUNCH
info:
FRUIT TEA PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. sugar
2 c. boiling water
8 tea bags
1 qt. boiling water
2 c. orange juice
3/4 c. lemon juice
1 1/2 c. pineapple juice
1 1/2 qt. cold water

preparation

Mix sugar and boiling water until sugar dissolves. Add tea bags to boiling water and steep 10 minutes. Mix all ingredients together and chill. Makes 1 gallon.

title: 103. FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH
info:
FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 c. water
2 c. sugar
1 (No. 2) can pineapple juice
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade
3 bananas, mashed
4 qt. 7-Up
2 Tbsp. lemon juice

preparation

Boil water and sugar; cool. Add next 4 ingredients; mix well. Freeze in a covered flat container. When needed for serving, let set until slightly softened, 1 to 2 hours. Scrape frozen mixture into punch bowl to form slush. Add 7-Up and lemon juice; serve.

title: 224. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 pkg. unsweetened cherry Kool-Aid
2 qt. water
2 c. sugar
46 oz. can pineapple juice
4 liters ginger ale

preparation

Mix well until sugar is dissolved. Add pineapple juice and stir. Pour into 2 clean 1/2 gallon cardboard milk containers. Close with paper clips and freeze solid. One hour before serving, remove frozen slush from freezer and place in punch bowl. Let sit until serving time. With fork, chop and scrape until well broken up. Add ginger ale. Mix and serve.

title: 110. HOLIDAY PUNCH SLUSH
info:
HOLIDAY PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade
2 c. strong tea (made with 3 tea bags)
2 c. sugar
7 c. water
2 c. vodka or gin

preparation

Make strong tea with 3 tea bags. Combine all other ingredients and mix. Freeze in Tupperware. Ready to serve in 24 hours. To serve, fill glass 1/2 full with slush and 1/2 full with 7-Up or Sprite.

title: 259. SLUSH PUNCH FOR LARGE PARTY
info:
SLUSH PUNCH FOR LARGE PARTY

ingredients

2 c. sugar
1 (6 oz.) pkg. gelatin
6 c. boiling water
2 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
4 (1 liter) ginger ale, chilled

preparation

Use any flavor or color of gelatin in a 6-quart container. Combine sugar, gelatin and boiling water. Stir until gelatin and sugar are dissolved. Add pineapple juice. Mix well and pour into plastic containers and freeze for 24 hours.

Take out of freezer about an hour before serving. Empty into large punch bowl and break into chunks. Add ginger ale.

title: 238. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 (3 oz.) boxes lime jello
3 c. granulated sugar
2 qt. hot water
1 large can pineapple juice
9 to 10 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 qt. cold water
4 bottles ginger ale

preparation

Mix and dissolve jello, sugar and hot water. Add pineapple juice, lemon and cold water. Mix well. Freeze in 3 portions in plastic containers. Allow at least 2 days to freeze. When ready to serve, take 1 portion of frozen mixture and put in punch bowl. Pour ginger ale over frozen mixture, then use an ice pick to make a slush mixture. Repeat with another frozen mixture and ginger ale as needed.

Suggestion: Large 12-inch diameter Tupperware container will hold entire mixture for mixing.

title: 299. GOLDEN TEA PUNCH
info:
GOLDEN TEA PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. water
2 rounded Tbsp. instant tea
1/2 c. sugar
3 c. orange juice
1 c. lemon juice
1 c. pineapple juice
1/4 c. grenadine
1 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Stir instant tea into water until dissolved. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Add juices. Chill. Pour punch into bowl and add ginger ale. Add an ice mold to punch to chill. Serves 18.

title: 24. ICE TEA SLUSH
info:
ICE TEA SLUSH

ingredients

2 tea bags
1 c. boiling water
1 c. sugar
3 1/2 c. water
1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1/2 c. bourbon or whiskey
1/2 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade

preparation

Steep tea in boiling water 2 to 3 minutes; remove tea bags and discard. Stir in sugar. Add remaining ingredients and mix until sugar is dissolved. Pour in container for freezer and freeze until firm. Remove about 10 minutes before serving. Spoon into glasses; garnish with lemon wedges. Keep unused portion in freezer. Makes 1 1/2 quarts.

title: 45. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 bananas
12 oz. orange juice, frozen
12 oz. lemonade, frozen
46 oz. pineapple juice
4 c. water
2 c. sugar

preparation

Boil water and sugar. Chill. Put bananas in blender. Blend with juices. Before freezing, divide in half and freeze. Before serving, thaw 2 hours. Place in punch bowl and add 3 quarts of Wink before serving.

title: 236. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (48 oz.) can pineapple juice
9 c. water
1 large ginger ale
1 c. sugar

preparation

Mix and freeze all ingredients, except ginger ale, in plastic milk jugs. Take out of freezer 4 hours before you serve, add ginger ale. No ice is needed.

title: 104. FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH
info:
FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

24 oz. pineapple juice
24 oz. Hawaiian Punch
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice
4 bananas
3 c. water
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. lemon juice

preparation

Mash bananas, adding lemon juice. Dissolve sugar in water. Add bananas and juices to sugar water. Freeze. Two hours before serving, remove from freezer. To 2 quarts of frozen mixture, add 16 ounces ginger ale. Stir until punch is slushy. Serves 12.

title: 206. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 1/2 c. sugar
12 oz. can frozen orange juice
12 oz. can frozen lemonade
46 oz. can pineapple juice
2 bottles of Squirt (2 Liter)

preparation

Mix 2 1/2 c. sugar and 3 c. water. Add 1 can of orange juice and 1 can of lemonade. Add 1 can pineapple juice. Mix well. Add 3 cups cold water. Pour into (2) 9 X 13 pans and freeze. Cut into 3 inch squares. Put into freezer bags (one pan per freezer bag). Take one bag of cubes and add a 2 Liter bottle of pop. (Makes 2 batches.)

title: 63. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (2 liter) large Sprite
4 c. sugar
7 c. water
1 small can concentrated orange juice
1 small can concentrated lemonade
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
4 c. crushed pineapple
6 large bananas, mashed

preparation

Dissolve sugar in water in a large bowl. Add other ingredients; freeze. Remove from freezer approximately 2 hours before serving and mash into slush with a potato masher.

title: 216. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 pkg. lemonade Kool-Aid
1 box Jell-O (whatever flavor/color you desire)
2 c. sugar (add one and taste, 2 may be too sweet)
2 c. water
1 qt. unsweetened pineapple juice

preparation

Mix all ingredients and freeze in Baggies. Have 2 bottles of ginger ale real cold. Set Baggies out to begin to soften. Put in bowl and pour ginger ale over. Mix and chop. Makes a cool slushy punch.

title: 22. GREEN TEA BANANA SLUSH
info:
GREEN TEA BANANA SLUSH

ingredients

1 c. water
1/4 c. sugar
3 Lipton green tea, tea bags
1 frozen banana, sliced
1 c. ice cubes (about 6-8)

preparation

In saucepan, bring water and sugar to a boil; remove from heat. Add tea bags and brew for 1 1/2 minutes, dunking bags occasionally. Remove tea bags and chill. In a blender, process all ingredients at high speed until blended. Pour into frosty glass. Garnish, if desired with whipped cream and mint twigs and serve.

title: 121. ORANGE SLUSH PUNCH
info:
ORANGE SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. sugar
6 c. water
4 bananas, mashed
1/2 c. lemon juice
2 (12 oz.) cans frozen orange juice
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (2 liter) bottle 7-Up

preparation

Mix well all ingredients, except 7-Up and freeze until firm. Remove from freezer 2 hours before serving. Break frozen mixture into large pieces and put in punch bowl. Add 7-Up and stir until slushy. Makes 6 1/2 quarts.

title: 268. STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

23 oz. orange juice
23 oz. pineapple juice
2 1/2 lb. frozen strawberries
ginger ale or 7-Up
red food coloring (optional)

preparation

Let frozen strawberries thaw and mix strawberries, orange juice and pineapple juice together. Re-freeze mixture. About 1 hour before serving punch, remove frozen mixture from freezer and partially thaw. Cut into "chunks." Beat mixture with wire whip until broken up and "slushy." Add ginger ale or 7-Up until punch is desired consistency. Serve immediately. Makes 1 gallon.

title: 274. YELLOW SLUSH PUNCH
info:
YELLOW SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 1/2 c. sugar
19 c. lukewarm water
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice concentrate
1 (6 oz.) can frozen limeade
1 tsp. almond extract
1 (1 liter) bottle ginger ale, chilled

preparation

Dissolve the sugar in the water in a large freezer container. Add pineapple juice, orange juice, limeade and almond extract and mix well. Freeze, covered, until needed. Let stand until slushy. Combine with the ginger ale in a punch bowl and mix gently. Makes 50 servings.

title: 161. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 can pineapple juice
3 bananas, diced
2 c. sugar
1 large can crushed pineapple
3 c. water
1 (2 liter) 7-Up

preparation

Boil water and sugar until sugar is dissolved. When cooled, add pineapple juice, pineapple and bananas. Put in freezer for 1 or 2 hours before you want to use. Just before serving, add 2 liter 7-Up. This should be thick like a slush.

title: 158. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (3 oz.) jello, any flavor
4 c. boiling water
2 c. sugar
1 (12 oz.) frozen lemonade
1 (46 oz.) pineapple juice
1 2-liter 7-Up

preparation

Dissolve jello in boiling water. Add sugar, lemonade, and pineapple juice. Freeze for at least 12 hours. Add 7-Up before serving.

title: 248. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 pkg. Jell-O (any color)
1 1/3 c. sugar
3 c. water
1/4 c. lemon juice
1 tsp. almond extract
1 large can pineapple juice

preparation

Boil water and dissolve sugar and Jell-O. Mix all ingredients in a gallon jug. Fill with water and shake. Freeze. Let thaw 12 hours before serving.

title: 97. FRUIT PUNCH SLUSH
info:
FRUIT PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

6 ripe bananas
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 (42 oz.) can pineapple juice
2 c. sugar
3 c. water

preparation

Puree the bananas in a food processor along with the thawed lemonade. Then add the other ingredients and mix well. This mixture is frozen and will fit in a gallon plastic milk jug. Before serving, partially thaw and add the following: 1 (64-ounce) ginger ale and 1 (64-ounce) lemon-lime soft drink. Yields 50 (1/2-cup) servings. You can cut the amount of sugar in half.

title: 36. APRICOT SLUSH PUNCH
info:
APRICOT SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 small apricot Jell-O
9 c. water
3 c. sugar

preparation

Boil 3 minutes. Cool thoroughly and add 1 large can pineapple juice and 1 large frozen orange juice (undiluted). Freeze in gallon jugs filling below the neck to allow for expansion. Remove from freezer 2 to 3 hours before using. Add 1 liter 7-Up to each recipe. Makes 40 (15 ounce) servings.

title: 46. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. sugar
11 c. water
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade
2 (20 oz.) cans crushed pineapple
4 large ripe bananas, mashed
1 large can pineapple juice
2 (2 liter) 7-Up or ginger ale

preparation

Boil the sugar and water together a few minutes, then cool. Blend with next 4 ingredients and freeze. To serve, take out of the freezer ahead of time for thawing. Add pineapple juice to the slush and 7-Up or ginger ale. Serve slightly thick. Serves 35 to 40 people.

title: 212. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 qt. lemonade, mixed with sugar
2 c. water
1 small frozen lemonade and water called for
1 large pineapple juice
1/2 to 3/4 c. sugar (sweeten to taste)
2 liter bottle Mountain Dew

preparation

Mix all ingredients together. Freeze. Serve slushy.

title: 292. FRUIT TEA PUNCH
info:
FRUIT TEA PUNCH

ingredients

1 large frozen pineapple juice
1 large frozen orange juice
1 large frozen lemonade
1 gal. prepared tea
1 1/2 c. sugar

preparation

Mix all together and serve over ice.

For hot spice tea, add cinnamon and cloves to Fruit Tea Punch.

title: 260. STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid
2 c. sugar
2 qt. water
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 or 2 boxes thawed frozen strawberries
1 can frozen pink lemonade
1 qt. 7-Up

preparation

Boil and cool the first 3 ingredients. Add the pineapple juice, strawberries and pink lemonade. Freeze in ice cream pail. Stir occasionally. Before serving, add the 7-Up.

title: 26. NO. 3 TROPICAL TREAT PUNCH NON-ALCOHOLIC DRINK
info:
NO. 3 TROPICAL TREAT PUNCH NON-ALCOHOLIC DRINK

ingredients

2 qt. pre-diluted orange juice
1 qt. pineapple-coconut juice (available at health food stores)
4 c. ice

preparation

Combine all 3 ingredients. Makes 1 gallon.

title: 144. RED SLUSH PUNCH
info:
RED SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 pkg. cherry Kool-Aid
3 qt. water
4 c. sugar
1 qt. pineapple juice
1 qt. apple juice

preparation

Mix Kool-Aid with water until dissolved. Add sugar and both juices. Stir well and pour into empty cartons. Freeze 24 hours at least. Thaw 2 hours and serve. No ice necessary. Should be slushy.

title: 219. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 c. sugar
1 qt. water
1 large can pineapple juice
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 (12 oz.) frozen orange juice
8 very ripe bananas
2 large bottles ginger ale

preparation

Bring to a boil 3 cups sugar and 1 quart water. Stir until sugar is dissolved. Cool. Add 1 large can pineapple juice, 1 can frozen lemonade and 1 can frozen orange juice. Add 8 very ripe bananas that have been mixed in osterizer. Mix all ingredients well. Freeze.

To use, thaw partially and add 2 large bottles ginger ale. Enjoy!

title: 250. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 c. water
1 pkg. Kool-Aid
46 oz. pineapple juice
3 oz. jello
3 c. sugar
1 qt. club soda

preparation

Jello and Kool-Aid can be any flavor. Bring water to a boil and dissolve jello. Add the Kool-Aid and the sugar. Stir until dissolved. Add pineapple juice to the mixture and freeze. When ready to serve, let mixture stand at room temperature until mix can be chopped into chunks and is slushy. Add club soda and serve.

title: 85. CRUNCHY FROZEN PUNCH-SLUSH
info:
CRUNCHY FROZEN PUNCH-SLUSH

ingredients

3 small pkg. strawberry or apricot jello
9 c. boiling water
4 c. white sugar
1 (16 oz.) frozen lemonade concentrate
2 large cans pineapple juice or frozen pineapple juice concentrate
2 large bottles 7-Up or ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve jello and sugar in boiling water. Bring to a boil. Set aside to cool.

Add lemonade and pineapple juice next. Mix well. Freeze in plastic containers. Cover with foil. When ready to use, uncover and place container in hot water. When it is almost ready, add 7-Up and mix. It should be slushy. It's ready to serve. Yields 40 cups. If you add 1 quart pineapple sherbet, it will even taste better.

title: 116. LIME SLUSH PUNCH
info:
LIME SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime gelatin
3 c. pineapple juice
1 c. cold water
2 c. boiling water
1/3 c. lemon juice
1 (64 oz.) ginger ale, chilled

preparation

Mix together first 5 ingredients. Cover and freeze for 8 hours. Take out 1 hour before using. Add ginger ale. Makes 1 gallon.

title: 296. FRUIT-TEA PUNCH
info:
FRUIT-TEA PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. boiling water
4 tea bags black tea
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 c. orange juice
1 Tbsp. honey
1 lemon
2 oranges
2 c. fresh strawberries
1 bottle soda water

preparation

Pour boiling water over tea bags; steep 3 minutes. Remove tea bags. Blend in juices; sweeten with honey. Cut peel from lemon and oranges; section fruit. Remove all membranes; add to tea. Wash and hull strawberries; cut in half. Add to tea; cover. Refrigerate punch at least 6 hours to blend flavors. Just before serving, add bottle of soda water. Yields about 10 cups.

title: 117. LIME SLUSH PUNCH
info:
LIME SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1/2 c. sugar
1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime flavored gelatin
2 c. boiling water
3 c. unsweetened pineapple juice
1/3 c. lemon juice
1 c. cold water
1 (64 oz.) bottle ginger ale, chilled

preparation

Dissolve sugar and gelatin in boiling water in large bowl. Stir in juices and cold water. Cover and freeze 8 hours. Remove 1 hour before serving. Break into chunks and pour in ginger ale. Stir until slushy. Yield: 1 gallon.

title: 123. ORANGE SLUSH PUNCH
info:
ORANGE SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 c. sugar
6 c. water
4 bananas, mashed
1/2 c. lemon juice
2 (12 oz.) cans frozen juice concentrate, thawed (undiluted)
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (67.6 oz.) bottle lemon-lime carbonated beverage, chilled

preparation

Combine sugar and water in a Dutch oven; cook over high heat, stirring often, until sugar dissolves. Let mixture cool. Add bananas and next 3 ingredients to sugar mixture; stir well. Freeze until firm.

Remove from freezer about 2 hours before serving. Break frozen mixture into large pieces and place in punch bowl. Pour in carbonated beverage; stir gently until slushy. Yield: 6 1/2 quarts.

title: 245. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 c. sugar
6 c. water
2 (12 oz.) cans frozen orange juice
2 (12 oz.) cans frozen lemonade
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
2 (16 oz.) cans pineapple chunks
3 qt. ginger ale

preparation
