Bring water and sugar to a rapid boil, making a simple syrup. Add remaining ingredients except ginger ale and mix thoroughly. Freeze mixture. When ready to use, stir in ginger ale. Yield: 5 quarts of slush mix.

title: 61. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. sugar
3 c. water
2 c. orange juice
1/4 c. lemon juice
5 ripe bananas
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice

preparation

Combine the ingredients (bananas, lemon and orange juice) in blender. The rest, put in a large container, then mix well. Pour into Tupperware container or 1/2 gallon milk carton. Freeze. When ready to serve, set out of freezer until thawed to slush (3 hours or so, depending on weather). Add 4 quarts of ginger ale. Makes 50 servings. Can be colored with food coloring to match color scheme. Can be frozen in 4-pint container, if you choose.

title: 54. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 c. water
4 c. sugar
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (46 oz.) can orange juice
juice of 2 lemons
5 bananas, pureed
2 to 3 (32 oz.) bottles tonic water

preparation

Heat water and sugar until dissolved. Add juices and bananas. Pour into ice cube trays, a shallow pan or empty milk carton; freeze. Thaw 2 to 3 hours to form a slush. Place in punch bowl. Add tonic water. Yields about 27 cups.

title: 27. RED PUNCH DRINK
info:
RED PUNCH DRINK

ingredients

2 pkg. raspberry Kool-Aid
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 qt. pineapple juice

preparation

Mix Kool-Aid, orange juice and lemonade as directed on package. Mix all with pineapple juice. Pour over ice.

title: 37. BANANA "SLUSH" PUNCH
info:
BANANA "SLUSH" PUNCH

ingredients

7 c. water
1 qt. ginger ale
1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 (6 oz.) can frozen pineapple juice
3 1/2 c. sugar

preparation

Boil water and sugar. Cool and add remaining ingredients, except ginger ale. Freeze mixture in freezer bags for approximately 2 to 3 hours before serving. Remove from freezer and add ginger ale.

title: 177. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 cans Hawaiian Punch
1 can unsweetened pineapple juice
2 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid
2 c. sugar
1 (33.8 oz.) bottle ginger ale

preparation

Combine all ingredients, except ginger ale. Mix well and freeze. Before serving, remove from freezer and allow to partially thaw. Stir in ginger ale. Serve slushy. No ice is needed.

title: 66. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 c. water
2 c. sugar
1/4 c. lemon juice
3 bananas, pureed
1 1/2 c. orange juice
46 oz. pineapple juice
3 qt. Sprite

preparation

Get your favorite glass and a spoon. Squirt as much chocolate syrup in your cup that you can get away with and add milk to fill your cup. Stir well. Drink this as fast as you can and ask to make more. Don't ask to do this before dinner though because your mom will say "you can't have anything to drink because it will ruin your supper".

title: 218. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 oz. pkg. wild strawberry Jell-O
2 c. sugar
2 c. boiling water
4 1/2 c. cold water
46 oz. can pineapple juice
1 c. ReaLemon juice
1 Tbsp. almond extract
2 liter bottle 7-Up

preparation

Dissolve Jell-O and sugar in the boiling water. Add the cold water, pineapple juice, lemon juice and almond extract. Place punch into a plastic gallon ice cream bucket and freeze. Thaw 4 to 6 hours and place into punch bowl. Add the 7-Up and serve. Makes 1 1/2 gallons of delicious punch.

title: 140. PUNCH SLUSH
info:
PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

2 c. sugar
4 c. water
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
20 oz. pineapple juice
3 mashed bananas (blender or potato masher)
4 qt. 7-Up
2 tsp. lemon juice

preparation

Boil sugar in water until dissolved. Cool and add the next 4 ingredients. Mix well and freeze in 2 containers. Thaw 2 hours before using. In punch bowl, pour 7-Up and lemon juice over frozen mixture to serve.

title: 44. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 c. water
3 qt. ginger ale, Sprite or 7-Up
5 bananas, mashed
4 c. sugar
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade or 1/4 c. lemon juice

preparation

Boil sugar and water until dissolved; cool. Add fruit juices and bananas. Blend well and freeze. Let thaw about 2 hours before serving. Just before serving, add the ginger ale in punch bowl and stir until slushy.

title: 31. TEA STRAWBERRY SLUSH
info:
TEA STRAWBERRY SLUSH

ingredients

4 tea bags (caffeine free)
1 to 1 1/2 c. frozen strawberries
1/2 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade (Adams)
1 c. ice cubes

preparation

Steep tea using 2 cups of water and chill. In a blender, combine tea, strawberries and lemonade concentrate. Process until smooth. With blender running, gradually add about 1 cup ice cubes, processing until ice is melted. Garnish with fresh fruit. Serve immediately. Serves 4.

title: 289. FRUIT AND TEA PUNCH
info:
FRUIT AND TEA PUNCH

ingredients

3 c. sugar
juice of 10 lemons
juice of 2 oranges
1 1/2 c. pineapple juice
4 qt. strong tea

preparation

Combine sugar, lemon juice and orange juice in punch bowl. Mix until sugar is dissolved. Stir in pineapple juice and tea. Serve over crushed ice in tall glasses.

title: 114. LAMON'S BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
LAMON'S BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 bananas, sliced
4 c. sugar
6 c. water
2 (12 oz.) cans frozen orange juice, thawed
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade, thawed
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
6 qts. ginger ale

preparation

Blend bananas in bowl or blender. Combine bananas with sugar, water and juices. Mix well. Pour mixture into 3 one-half gallon containers. Freeze. Let thaw 1-2 hours before serving. To serve, add 2 quarts ginger ale to one-half gallon container. Yield 24 servings.

title: 91. FRUIT PUNCH SLUSH
info:
FRUIT PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

6 ripe bananas
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade, thawed
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice, thawed
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
3 c. water
1 c. sugar
2 (64 oz.) lemon-lime, chilled or ginger ale or Sprite

preparation

Combine bananas and fruit juices in blender until smooth. Mix other ingredients in blender, then mix all together. Pour into plastic freezer container to freeze (day ahead).

To serve, thaw until mushy. Add carbonated beverage. Makes 6 quarts. One gallon serves approximately 25.

title: 208. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 to 6 bananas, liquified in blender
1 can frozen lemonade
1 can frozen orange juice
1 can pineapple juice
4 c. sugar
4 c. water
4 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Mix sugar, water and liquified bananas, lemonade and juices together. Freeze in Ziploc bag, approximately 1 to 1 1/2 hours before serving time. Remove from Ziploc bag and place in a large bowl. Pour ginger ale over frozen chunk. As this starts to thaw, it makes a real good slushy drink.

title: 152. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 c. sugar
4 c. water
2 large pkg. strawberry jello
1 small pkg. lemon jello
1 large frozen orange juice
2 small cans frozen lemonade
2 large cans pineapple juice
2 oz. almond extract
1 gal. water

preparation

Mix sugar and water in a large pot. Boil until syrupy. Remove from heat and stir in jello until dissolved. Add frozen juices, pineapple juice, almond extract and water. Mix well. Pour into jugs or empty drink bottles and freeze. Thaw 2 hours before serving.

title: 271. TROPICAL PUNCH SLUSH
info:
TROPICAL PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

8 pkg. Tropical Punch Kool-Aid
12 c. sugar
2 large cans crushed pineapple

preparation

Mix ingredients and add enough water for large Tupperware container. Freeze and keep stirred.

title: 262. STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 large can pineapple juice
1 pkg. orange Kool-Aid
2 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid
2 qt. water
3 c. sugar
1/3 ??? lemon juice
24 oz. Sprite
3 bananas, mashed

preparation

Mix bananas, lemon juice and some pineapple juice in blender. Mix with rest of ingredients. Freeze at least 2 to 3 days. Let thaw for 5 to 7 hours until slushy. Makes 20 servings.

Can add additional Sprite to help make slushy. Can vary Kool-Aid for color or flavor.

title: 243. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

5 (3 oz.) pkg. jello
5 c. sugar
84 oz. unsweetened pineapple juice
1 pt. lemon juice (real lemon or equivalent)
18 oz. grapefruit juice
4 qt. cold water

preparation

May use any flavor gelatin. Dissolve jello in 5 cups boiling water. Add all other ingredients. Freeze. Keeps well. Set out of freezer 3 to 4 hours before serving (sometimes you have to chop with wooden spoon). Add 6 quarts 7-Up and 2 quarts ginger ale when serving. No need for ice or ice rings. Stays cold. Makes at least 150 punch cups.

title: 98. FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH
info:
FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 bananas
12 oz. frozen orange juice, thawed
2 c. water
2 (2 liter) bottles Sprite
6 oz. frozen lemonade, thawed
46 oz. pineapple juice (unsweetened)
3 c. sugar

preparation

In a blender mix bananas, orange juice and lemonade. In a gallon container mix water, sugar and pineapple juice. Stir in banana mixture. Freeze mixture. About 3 hours before serving, take out of freezer to thaw. Add Sprite immediately before serving. Serves 25 to 30 people.

title: 19. CARDINAL PUNCH (NON-ALCOHOLIC DRINK)
info:
CARDINAL PUNCH (NON-ALCOHOLIC DRINK)
(44 Servings)

ingredients

1 qt. cranberry juice
1 pt. orange juice
2 lemons, squeezed or 2 oz. lemon juice
4 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Combine juices with ice and chill. Pour into punch bowl over block of ice; add ginger ale. Garnish glasses with mint sprig. (May add orange sherbet scoops.)

title: 18. TEA DRINK
info:
TEA DRINK

ingredients

3 tea bags
1 1/2 c. sugar
8 Tbsp. lemon juice extract
1 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Soak tea bags overnight. Add sugar, lemon juice extract and ginger ale. Add enough water to make a gallon (about 2 quarts plus 1 cup water).

title: 272. WATERMELON SLUSH PUNCH
info:
WATERMELON SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3/4 c. sugar
1/2 c. water
2 c. seedless watermelon
1/4 tsp. salt or less
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. lime juice
2 drops red food coloring
7-Up

preparation

Boil sugar and water until clear and sugar is dissolved; set aside. In blender, blend watermelon, salt, lemon juice, food coloring and lime juice. Add sugar syrup. Freeze at least 24 hours. Break into chunks and place in glasses. Pour 7-Up over chunks, blending in slush.

title: 74. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 (12 oz.) cans frozen orange juice
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
5 bananas
1 small can crushed pineapple
4 c. sugar
6 c. hot water
4 (67.2 oz.) bottles ginger ale

preparation

In a blender, dissolve 4 cups sugar in 6 cups hot water (add food coloring, if desired). Add juices directly from the cans; add cut up bananas and pineapple. Freeze. To serve, put the frozen mixture into a punch bowl. Pour ginger ale over it and mix slowly so mixture becomes slushy. Yield: 60 servings.

title: 196. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 or 5 oranges, juiced
3 lemons, juiced
1 large can pineapple juice
5 large bananas, mashed
1 pkg. Kool-Aid (whatever color)
4 c. sugar
3 c. water

preparation

Freeze. Stir several times during freezing.

For punch, add ginger ale to slush in a punch bowl. Serves 25 to 30.

title: 126. PARTY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
PARTY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 large (6 oz.) strawberry jello
2 c. hot water
4 c. sugar
1 pt. ReaLemon juice
2 Tbsp. almond extract
9 c. water
1 large (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 large can frozen orange juice
4 to 6 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Mix jello, hot water and sugar together until jello is dissolved. Add all other ingredients except ginger ale. Put in containers and freeze. I use butter tubs or freezer bags. Take out of freezer 3 hours before serving. Place in punch bowl and pour ginger ale over. Mix together. This will be slushy.

title: 64. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 c. hot water
4 c. sugar
1 large can pineapple juice
2 (12 oz.) cans frozen orange juice, thawed and undiluted
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade, thawed and undiluted
6 ripe bananas, blended in blender
3 (2-liter) bottles ginger ale or lemon-lime soda

preparation

Dissolve sugar in hot water. Add pineapple juice, orange juice, lemonade and blended bananas. Freeze mixture in 3 large containers. Take out of freezer 2 hours before serving. For each container of punch mixture, add 1 cold bottle ginger ale or lemon-lime soda, serve while slushy.

title: 113. JELLO SLUSH PUNCH
info:
JELLO SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 small pkg. strawberry jello
1/2 c. sugar
1 qt. ginger ale
1 small frozen lemonade
2 small frozen orange juice
1 Tbsp. almond extract

preparation

Prepare all juices and jello as directed on packages (do not cool the jello). Combine these in large container. Add remaining ingredients, mixing well. Freeze overnight. Thaw about 3 1/2 hours before serving. Makes a slush. Makes about 2 gallons.

title: 230. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 qt. ginger ale
2 large cans unsweetened pineapple juice
2 cans water
2 c. sugar
1 bottle almond flavoring extract
food coloring (if desired)

preparation

Freeze for 16 to 20 hours. If using soon, stir every few hours or freeze and when ready to use, thaw out overnight. Keep stirred to give it the slush texture. Will keep frozen for several months.

title: 100. FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH
info:
FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 large Jell-O (cherry or lime)
1 1/2 c. sugar
2 c. boiling water
1 (6 oz.) can lemonade
4 1/3 cans water
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice plus 1 1/2 cans water
2 liter bottles 7-Up

preparation

Dissolve Jell-O and sugar in boiling water. Add lemonade, water, pineapple juice plus water. Freeze solid. Remove 3 hours before serving. Crush as you can. Add 2 liter bottles 7-Up.

title: 76. BEST EVER SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BEST EVER SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

46 oz. pineapple juice
46 oz. orange juice
1 c. sugar
1 c. water
30 oz. frozen Hawaiian Punch concentrate or 1 qt. liquid concentrate
2 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Mix all ingredients in an empty ice cream pail. Mix well and freeze. Take out of freezer 4 to 5 hours ahead to thaw a little. Chop with a knife to make slush. Put into punch bowl and add ginger ale just before serving; will be slushy. Makes 50 (5 ounce) servings. (You can make this several days ahead of time and keep frozen until ready to use. Take out a few hours ahead of time.)

title: 281. CHRISTMAS PUNCH OR HOT RUSSIAN TEA
info:
CHRISTMAS PUNCH OR HOT RUSSIAN TEA

ingredients

2 small tea bags
2 cinnamon sticks
15 whole cloves
1 large box cherry Jell-O or 2 small
1 1/2 c. sugar (may use only 1 c.)
1 large can pineapple juice
4 lemons or 4 Tbsp. lemon juice

preparation

Simmer tea, cinnamon and cloves in 4 cups water for 30 minutes. Dissolve Jell-O in 2 cups boiling water. Pour Jell-O mixture into large container. Then add 6 cups cold water. Now add sugar and pineapple juice. Squeeze and strain lemons and add to Jell-O mixture. Strain tea mixture and combine with Jell-O mixture. Makes more than one gallon. Serve cold for punch and hot for tea.

title: 108. GAY'S PINEAPPLE BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
GAY'S PINEAPPLE BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. sugar
4 c. water
2 large cans crushed pineapple
3 to 4 bananas
1 can orange juice
1 (3-liter) bottle ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve sugar in water to make a light syrup. Mix syrup with next three ingredients and pour into small containers to freeze solid. Approximately 1 hour before serving, remove containers from freezer and place in punch bowl. Pour ginger ale over frozen ingredients. As mixture thaws, rake a fork over ice mixture to make slushy.

title: 295. FRUIT TEA PUNCH
info:
FRUIT TEA PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. sugar
1 c. water
2 c. strong tea
1 c. lemon juice
2 1/2 c. orange juice
2 c. pineapple juice
2 c. frozen strawberries
1 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Make a syrup of 2 cups of sugar and 1 cup of water. Add tea, fruit juices and enough water to make 1 1/2 gallons. Stir in strawberries and ginger ale just before serving. Makes about 50 servings.

title: 235. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 (46 oz.) cans unsweetened pineapple juice
3 (6 oz.) cans thawed orange juice
4 pkg. unsweetened Kool-Aid
4 c. sugar
5 qt. water

preparation

Mix together and freeze. (This makes the largest Tupperware cake taker full.) Remove from freezer 5 hours before serving. Chop up with fork and add two 2-liter bottles of ginger ale.

You can change the color of punch by changing the Kool-Aid. Example: For red punch, use 2 cherry and 2 strawberry. For yellow punch, use 4 lemonade. For purple punch, use 4 grape. For pink punch, use 3 pink lemonade and 1 cherry. For green punch, use 4 lime. Punch can be frozen if ginger ale is not added.

title: 170. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 large pkg. any flavor Jell-O (flavor determines color)
1 1/2 c. sugar
5 c. pineapple juice
1 small can frozen lemonade
1 small can frozen limeade
1 qt. ginger ale (added when ready to serve)

preparation

Dissolve Jell-O in water as directed on package. Add sugar while hot. Add other juices. Mix well. Freeze. When ready to use, remove from freezer at least 2 hours before serving. Break up and stir until slushy. Add ginger ale. Makes approximately 50 cups.

title: 35. AGGIE SLUSH PUNCH
info:
AGGIE SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (46 oz.) can unsweetened pineapple juice
1 (48 oz.) bottle Ocean Spray cranberry juice cocktail
1 c. sugar
2 (1 liter) bottles ginger ale

preparation

Mix juices with sugar and freeze. Two hours before the punch is to be served, remove from freezer and let thaw. Right before serving, scoop thawed juice into punch bowl and pour ginger ale into the bowl. The ginger ale will cause the frozen juice to melt even quicker. Stir thoroughly and break up large chunks of ice. Punch will be mushy.

title: 232. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 pkg. cherry Kool-Aid
1 pkg. orange Kool-Aid
3 c. sugar
1 1/2 qt. water
1 tall pineapple juice
juice of 3 lemons
3 mashed bananas
3 qt. 7-Up

preparation

Freeze overnight. Take out 2 hours ahead and beat occasionally.

title: 87. FROZEN P.T.A.  SLUSH PUNCH
info:
FROZEN P.T.A. SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 1/2 c. sugar
6 c. water
5 to 6 bananas
1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice
3 juice cans water
1/2 c. lemon juice
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
2 to 3 qt. 7-Up, Squirt or lemon juice

preparation

Boil sugar and water 5 minutes. Cool. Mash bananas in blender and add rest of the ingredients except 7-Up. Freeze. Remove from freezer 2 hours before serving. Add 7-Up and serve slushy. You may have to break up frozen chunks.

title: 167. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (46 oz.) can unsweetened pineapple juice
1 (12 oz.) can unsweetened apple juice plus 3 cans water
1 Tbsp. almond flavoring
1 (2 liter) 7-Up

preparation

Combine all ingredients and place in freezer. Stir after 8 to 12 hours. Stir occasionally. When ready to serve, add one 2 liter bottle diet 7-Up.

title: 154. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH
(Serves 50)

ingredients

6 c. water
2 pkg. lemon jello
3 1/2 c. sugar
1 (46 oz.) pineapple juice
juice of 5 lemons
4 c. water
3 bottles ginger ale

preparation

Boil sugar and water together. Add lemon jello, stir until dissolved. Add cold water. When cool, add pineapple juice and juice of 5 lemons. Pour in 3 half-gallon milk cartons and freeze.

Before serving, thaw about 3 hours at room temperature until crunchy. Add ginger ale just before serving, 1 large bottle ginger ale per carton of punch. Do not add ice. May use cherry or strawberry jello for pink punch.

title: 215. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. boiling water
1 large pkg. Jell-O
1 c. sugar
8 c. water
1 large can pineapple juice

preparation

Combine. Add water to make a gallon. Freeze. Remove from freezer 6 hours before serving. Serves 15 to 20.

title: 94. FRUIT PUNCH SLUSH
info:
FRUIT PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

6 ripe bananas, pureed
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 (42 oz.) can pineapple juice
2 c. sugar
3 c. water
1 (64 oz.) bottle ginger ale
1 (64 oz.) bottle lemon-lime soft drink

preparation

Puree the bananas in a food processor, along with the thawed lemonade. Then add the orange juice, pineapple juice, sugar and water; mix well. This mixture is frozen and will fit in a gallon plastic milk jug. Before serving, partially thaw and add the ginger ale and lemon-lime soft drink. Yields 50 (1/2 cup) servings. You can reduce amount of sugar.

title: 102. FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH
info:
FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 can pineapple juice
12 oz. can frozen orange juice
12 oz. can frozen lemonade
3 mashed bananas
4 c. water
1 lemon-lime soda pop

preparation

Mix thoroughly and freeze. When ready to serve, stir to mash. Add soda pop. Yields 25 servings.

title: 42. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 cups sugar
6 cups hot water
5 ripe bananas
1 46 oz. can pineapple juice
1 46 oz. can orange juice
juice of 2 lemons
1 tsp. vanilla
2 qts. ginger ale

preparation

Mix sugar in hot water, let cool. Add juices. Blend in bananas and lemon juice. Freeze in (2) 1 gal. ziploc baggies. Remove from freezer 3 - 4 hours before use. Mix 1 bag to 1 qt. ginger ale. Serves 50.

title: 166. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. hot water
1 large pkg. Jell-O
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 large can pineapple juice
1 (2 liter) bottle ginger ale

preparation

Mix Jell-O and sugar in hot water until dissolved; add pineapple juice. Stir constantly. Add water to make 1 gallon. Freeze overnight. Take out of freezer and clip with pick or knife. Add ginger ale.

title: 148. SLUSH OF A PUNCH
info:
SLUSH OF A PUNCH

ingredients

1 large can pineapple juice
2 large cans frozen orange juice (12 oz.)
2 large cans frozen lemonade (12 oz.)
2 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid

preparation

Sweeten to own taste. Freeze until slushy. When ready to serve, pour ginger ale over and mix. You can add food coloring to darken color.

title: 182. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH
(Serves 100 People, 8 Ounce Cups)

ingredients

3 (6 oz.) pkg. Jell-O (any color)
6 c. sugar
6 qt. hot water
3 c. plus 4 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 (46 oz.) pineapple juice
4 qt. cold water
4 qt. 7-Up, Sprite, sparkle water or ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve Jell-O and sugar in hot water. Add lemon juice, pineapple juice and cold water. Then freeze overnight or 6 to 12 hours. Remove, shake and add 7-Up or one of the other. Delicious. Great for weddings or showers, just any time. Freeze in punch bowl.

title: 137. PUNCH SLUSH
info:
PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

1 (6 oz.) pkg. jello
2 c. sugar
6 c. water
2 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
3 large bottles ginger ale (cold)

preparation

Heat 3 cups water to boil. Dissolve jello and sugar. Add 3 cups cold water; add juice. Freeze. One hour before serving, use potato masher and mash to soften. Add ginger ale.

title: 234. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 (46 oz.) cans unsweetened pineapple juice
3 (6 oz.) cans frozen orange juice, thawed
2 pkg. cherry powdered drink mix
2 pkg. strawberry powdered drink mix
4 c. sugar
5 qt. water

preparation

Mix together and freeze. Take out of freezer 5 hours before serving. Chip up with fork and add 2 bottles of ginger ale.

title: 38. BANANA PUNCH (SLUSH)
info:
BANANA PUNCH (SLUSH)

ingredients

2 c. sugar
9 c. water
3 mashed bananas
1/4 c. ReaLemon juice
1 large can pineapple juice
1 large can frozen orange juice
1 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Mix sugar with 3 cups water and boil for ten minutes. Let cool. In another container, put bananas, lemon juice, pineapple juice and orange juice. Mix well. Add to cooled syrup and freeze. Take from freezer one hour before using. Use a wooden spoon to break frozen mix apart and stir into a slush. Do not let mix thaw completely. Add 6 cups of water and ginger ale; stir and enjoy.

title: 278. ALMOND TEA PUNCH
info:
ALMOND TEA PUNCH

ingredients

4 tea bags
2 c. boiling water
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/3 c. lemon juice
1 tsp. vanilla and almond extract
2 qt. water

preparation

Boil water and steep tea 5 minutes. Add sugar, lemon juice, vanilla and almond extract to tea. Add the water and stir well. Freeze. Remove from freezer in time to allow it to become slushy at serving time.

title: 69. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

5 bananas
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice concentrate
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade
2 1/2 c. sugar
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
water
4 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Mash bananas thoroughly and add the slightly thawed orange juice and lemonade. Sprinkle sugar over mixture. Add the pineapple juice, stirring well to dissolve the sugar. Put mixture into a gallon milk container and fill with water; do not fill to the top of container. Allow space for expansion during freezing. Freeze to a slush. At serving time, cut off top of milk container to remove slush. Place mixture in a 2-gallon punch bowl and add the ginger ale.

This punch base can be frozen and kept indefinitely (well almost). Before serving, allow several hours for the mixture to reach the slush stage. This is a great punch and one of our favorites. Makes 64 (4-ounce) servings.

title: 297. GINGER TEA PUNCH
info:
GINGER TEA PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. brewed tea
juice of 2 oranges
juice of 1 lemon
1/4 c. sugar
1 (16 oz.) bottle ginger ale or mint ginger ale

preparation

Brew 2 cups of regular tea. Cool slightly. Add fruit juices and sugar. Add ginger ale just before serving. Serve over ice.

title: 135. PUNCH SLUSH
info:
PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

2 c. sugar
1 frozen lemonade (12 oz.)
1 frozen orange juice (6 oz.)
2 c. strong tea (3 tea bags to 2 c. water)
7 c. water
1 c. whiskey or bourbon

preparation

Stir and put in large container. Freeze at least 10 hours. Take out of freezer 2 hours before serving.

title: 273. YELLOW SLUSH PUNCH
info:
YELLOW SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 pkg. lemonade Kool-Aid (unsweetened)
2 c. sugar
4 qt. water
1 large pineapple juice
3 Tbsp. almond extract
4 Tbsp. lemon jello
4 ripe bananas, blended (optional)
1 (2 liter) bottle 7-Up or Sprite

preparation

Boil 1 cup of the measured water to dissolved jello. Add all the remaining ingredients except 7-Up and dissolve well. Freeze in 3 (1/2 gallon) milk or juice boxes. Thaw to a slush and add 7-Up just before serving. (Takes about 5 hours to thaw.) To make red punch, substitute strawberry Kool-Aid and jello. To make green punch, substitute lime jello and Kool-Aid. Makes 2 gallons.

title: 157. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 pkg. Kool-Aid
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
2 tsp. almond extract
2 1/2 c. sugar
1 qt. water
2 tsp. vanilla extract

preparation

(Use the color Kool-Aid you wish your punch to be. You may add food coloring, if needed.)

Freeze ahead and stir occasionally. When ready to serve, add a bottle of chilled ginger ale. (Take out of freezer and let sit for 30 minutes to an hour to thaw slightly.) Serves 25.

title: 264. STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. sugar
4 c. water
2 (6 oz. each) boxes strawberry gelatin
64 oz. fruit punch
46 oz. Hawaiian Punch
46 oz. pineapple juice
2 (2 liter each) bottles 7-Up or Sprite

preparation

Combine the sugar and water in a medium size saucepan. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stir in the gelatin, stirring until completely dissolved. Add remaining ingredients (except 7-Up or Sprite) and stir to mix well. Pour into two 1-gallon plastic containers and freeze. Remove from freezer 1 to 2 hours before you plan to serve it so that it will begin to thaw. Break up the punch a little before pouring it into the punch bowl. Pour in the 7-Up or Sprite and gently slush the mixture using a dull knife. You will probably want to divide this punch into portions when serving, especially if you don't have a large punch bowl.

title: 183. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 1/2 c. sugar
3 c. water
2 (3 oz.) pkg. jello (flavor may vary)
1 oz. almond extract
1 (46 oz.) can unsweetened pineapple juice
16 1/2 c. water

preparation

Bring to a boil the sugar and water. Add jello and stir well. Add extract, pineapple juice and water. Mix well. Freeze at least overnight. Thaw 4 to 6 hours before serving. Serves 40. Makes 2 gallons.

title: 242. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 pkg. Kool-Aid (any flavor)
1 c. sugar
1 can unsweetened pineapple juice
ginger ale

preparation

Prepare in an empty gallon milk jug. Mix Kool-Aid, sugar and a small amount of water, then add pineapple juice. Fill rest of jug with water and freeze. Set out to thaw to where it is slushy, then pour cold ginger ale over it and serve.

title: 228. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 (46 oz.) cans unsweetened pineapple juice
3 (6 oz.) frozen orange juice
4 pkg. unsweetened Kool-Aid
4 c. sugar
5 qt. water
2 qt. ginger ale
2 liter 7-Up

preparation

Mix together and freeze. Take out 5 hours before serving. Chop up with a fork. Add ginger ale and 7-Up.

You change color by:

preparation

Red: Use 2 cherry and 2 strawberry Kool-Aid.

Yellow: Use 1 yellow and 4 lemonade.

Purple: Use 4 grape.

Pink: Use 3 pink lemonade and 1 cherry.

Green: Use 4 lime.

Serves 35 to 40 people.

title: 175. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 pkg. raspberry jello
9 c. water, boil and let cool
4 c. sugar
4 c. water, boil and let cool
2 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
1 (16 oz.) can lemonade concentrate

preparation

Freeze in gallon bags. Add 3 bottles (1 liter) ginger ale to frozen gallons at least one hour before serving.

title: 168. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 c. sugar
1 qt. Hi-C orange
6 pkg. unsweetened strawberry Kool-Aid
8 qt. water
1 qt. pineapple juice

preparation

Mix ingredients and pour into large containers and freeze. Remove from freezer and thaw to slush stage.

title: 56. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

8 c. pineapple juice (1 large can)
8 c. sugar
1 qt. plus 1 c. orange juice, mixed (one 12 oz. can frozen)
6 (28 oz.) bottles 7-Up
3 qt. warm water
1 c. lemon juice
10 mashed ripe bananas

preparation

Mix all ingredients well, except 7-Up. Freeze and store until day needed. Thaw to slush stage (about 4 hours). Pour into punch bowl and add 7-Up and serve. Serves 30 to 35.

title: 50. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 qt. water
3 c. sugar
6 to 8 mashed bananas
2 small cans frozen orange juice concentrate
3 small cans frozen lemonade concentrate
1 large can pineapple juice
3 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Heat water and sugar until sugar dissolves, stirring constantly. Cool. Add all other ingredients in a large bowl; stir. Freeze in containers.

When ready to serve, take out a container of punch and pour ginger ale on top, a little at a time, and break up with a potato masher until slushy. Serve in punch bowl.

title: 151. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 small boxes jello (color you prefer)
6 c. boiling water
3 c. sugar
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
2 small cans frozen lemonade
2 small cans frozen orange juice
1 bottle ginger ale

preparation

Freeze first 6 ingredients in 5 gallon bags. When ready to serve, add ginger ale, one bottle to each gallon of frozen juice.

title: 284. CRAN-GRAPE-TEA PUNCH
info:
CRAN-GRAPE-TEA PUNCH

ingredients

1 1/2 c. boiling water
2 family size tea bags
10 whole cloves
2 (3-inch) sticks cinnamon
2 c. cranberry juice cocktail
1 1/2 c. unsweetened white grape juice
1/2 c. sugar

preparation

Pour boiling water over tea bags and spices; cover and let stand 5 minutes. Remove tea bags, squeezing gently; remove and discard spices. Add fruit juices and sugar. Stir mixture until sugar dissolves. Serve hot or cold. Yields 5 cups.

title: 233. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. sugar
2 c. water
1 small pkg. cherry jello
1 oz. almond flavor extract
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice

preparation

Boil sugar, water and cherry jello. Then add almond flavor and pineapple juice. Place in large container and freeze. Serve slightly thawed. Great for parties!

title: 270. SUNSHINE PUNCH (SLUSH)
info:
SUNSHINE PUNCH (SLUSH)

ingredients

3 c. water
1 c. sugar
2 ripe bananas, cut up
2 (12 oz.) cans unsweetened pineapple juice
1 (6 oz.) can orange juice concentrate, thawed
1 (6 oz.) can lemonade concentrate, thawed
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
28 oz. carbonated water or club soda

preparation

In saucepan, bring water and sugar to a boil. Stir until sugar is dissolved. Boil gently 3 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool.

In blender, blend until smooth, bananas and 1 can unsweetened pineapple juice. Stir in 1 can unsweetened pineapple juice, orange juice, lemon concentrate and lemon juice. Turn into container and freeze for up to 2 months.

To Serve: Bring to room temperature, about 30 minutes. Pour into punch bowl and slowly add carbonated water or club soda. Decorate with strawberries or other fruits.

title: 231. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 c. water
2 1/2 c. sugar
2 small boxes wild strawberry Jell-O
4 c. cold water
1 large orange juice
1 large pineapple juice
6 Tbsp. lemon juice
ginger ale

preparation

Pour 6 cups of water into saucepan along with the sugar. Boil for 3 minutes. Mix in Jell-O, then combine this with all the remaining ingredients, except the ginger ale. Mix well and freeze in gallon jugs. Remove from freezer about 4 hours before serving time (punch should be slushy). Add 1 large ginger ale per 1 gallon punch.

title: 159. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 small boxes Jell-O (any flavor)
2 Tbsp. almond extract
2 bottles ginger ale or Sprite
1 can frozen lemonade
2 small cans frozen orange juice
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
4 c. sugar

preparation

Boil together 9 cups water and 4 cups sugar; add Jell-O to hot mixture. When thoroughly mixed, add 4 cups cold water, then add all ingredients, except ginger ale or Sprite! Freeze overnight or longer; remove 1 hour before serving. Stir with a fork and let the punch thaw to slush. Add ginger ale or Sprite.

title: 139. PUNCH SLUSH
info:
PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

4 c. sugar
6 c. water
5 bananas
2 small cans frozen lemonade concentrate
2 small cans frozen orange juice concentrate
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
6 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Bring sugar and water to a boil; let boil for 5 minutes. Cool. Put bananas in blender and cover with some of the juices. Process until bananas are smooth. To the cooled sugar water, add the bananas and all juices. Mix well. Pour into 6 equal containers and freeze. Before serving, remove from freezer. Partially thaw. Add 1 quart of ginger ale to each frozen portion and stir until slushy. Six portions serve fifty people.

title: 23. HOT PUNCH DRINK
info:
HOT PUNCH DRINK

ingredients

1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 qt. cranberry juice in jar
3 c. water
1 c. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. whole cloves
1 Tbsp. whole allspice
6 cinnamon sticks

preparation

Place spices in cheesecloth. Combine remaining ingredients in crock-pot. Put on No. 5 setting for 2 hours, then turn down to No. 2 setting. Keep warm for serving. Makes 24 (4 ounce) servings.

title: 128. PARTY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
PARTY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 qt. boiling water
4 to 5 c. sugar
1/4 c. citric acid
1 (46 oz.) can unsweetened pineapple juice
1 (12 oz.) can frozen pink lemonade
1 (10 oz.) can frozen strawberry daiquiri mix
4 qt. water
8 (10 oz.) bottles ginger ale

preparation

Combine 2 quarts boiling water, sugar and citric acid, stirring until sugar and acid dissolves. Combine pineapple juice (thawed), undiluted strawberry daiquiri mix and pink lemonade and 4 quarts of water. Add to sugar mixture in large plastic container. Divide evenly into four 1-gallon size heavy-duty zip-top bags. Freeze.

Remove each bag from freezer 30 minutes before serving. Place in punch bowl and break into chunks, add 2 bottles (10 ounces each) ginger ale. Serve.

title: 267. STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 large frozen orange juice concentrate
1 large frozen lemonade concentrate
1 46 oz can pineapple juice
1 Pre-sweetened pkg strawberry kool-aid
2 c water
3 1/2 c sugar
ginger ale

preparation

Prepare orange juice, lemonade, and kool-aid according to package directions. In large pot, combine all 3 with pineapple juice. Heat 2 c water and 3 1/2 c sugar until boiling and sugar has melted. Add to juice mixture. Allow to cool and then freeze. Makes 2 gallons. Before serving in punch bowl, pour about 2 c ginger ale over slush.

title: 164. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 large pkg. Jell-O
4 c. sugar
1 large can pineapple juice
16 oz. ReaLemon juice
almond flavoring
water
ginger ale
Sprite

preparation

Dissolve desired color and flavor Jell-O in 2 cups boiling water. Add sugar, pineapple juice, 12 cups water, lemon juice and flavoring (to taste). Place in container(s) and freeze to slushie state. When serving, add equal parts of punch, ginger ale and Sprite.

title: 246. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 1/2 c. sugar
6 c. water
2 pkg. jello
1 qt. orange juice
1 can pineapple juice
2/3 c. lemon juice
2 (28 oz.) bottles ginger ale

preparation

Boil water and sugar; simmer 3 minutes. Add jello and juices. Freeze. Remove from freezer; add ginger ale.

title: 199. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 small or 1 large pkg. Jell-O
3 c. hot water
1 c. sugar
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
2 qt. ginger ale, 7-Up or Sprite

preparation

Dissolve Jell-O in hot water. Add sugar and pineapple juice. Freeze. Remove from freezer in time for it to thaw just to slush stage. Add cold ginger ale before serving.

title: 142. RAMSEY FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH
info:
RAMSEY FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 c. hot water
2 c. sugar
1 (43 oz.) pineapple juice
1 3/4 c. ready to drink orange juice
1/4 c. lemon juice
3 ripe bananas, mashed

preparation

Combine all ingredients thoroughly. Mix with preferred carbonated drink (Ginger Ale is best choice). Makes 3 gallons. Use for holiday punch and top with frozen jello mold ring of fruit afloat in punch.

title: 21. GOLDEN PUNCH DRINK
info:
GOLDEN PUNCH DRINK

ingredients

2 (6 oz.) cans frozen orange juice
2 (6 oz.) cans frozen lemonade
2 (6 oz.) cans frozen pineapple juice
3 qt. water
2 qt. ginger ale
1 c. sugar

preparation

Mix all together and serve over ice. Serves 30 large glasses.

title: 220. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (46 oz.) pineapple juice
1 1/2 c. brandy (if desired)
12 oz. frozen lemonade
12 oz. frozen orange juice
1 qt. 7-Up or ginger ale

preparation

Mix all the ingredients together. Be sure it is completely mixed. Pour into wide mouth gallon jar or pitcher and freeze for at least 24 hours. Use scoop and put in glasses and pour more 7-Up or ginger ale over and stir slowly. This is a very refreshing drink for a hot day. Makes 1 gallon.

P.S. When I had a party, I had made some punch the first of the week and froze it. I used several bottles of the plastic 16-ounce drink bottles to freeze it in. (I left enough room at the top to cut off.) I opened the frozen punch and put it in a punch bowl then I had a gallon of cold (not frozen) that I poured over it. It was very slushy and extra good and I didn't have to use any ice.

title: 252. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 large cans pineapple juice
1 (8 oz.) bottle lemon juice
1 large pkg. cherry Jell-O
3 1/2 c. sugar
14 c. water

preparation

Bring 4 cups water to a boil and stir in the sugar and Jell-O until all is dissolved. Divide mixture between 2 one gallon jugs. Divide the 8 ounces of lemon juice in half and pour into jugs. Add 1 can pineapple juice to each gallon. Add the remaining 10 cups of water, 5 into each jug. Freeze. Take out of freezer 4 to 5 hours before serving. Shake and stir well.

title: 225. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 1/2 c. water
1 c. sugar
1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (6 oz.) can frozen limeade or lemonade
1 1/2 c. vodka or gin

preparation

Bring water and sugar to a boil; cool to tepid. Add juices and vodka or gin; mix together. Put in a plastic covered container and freeze. When serving, put a couple scoops into a glass and cover with ginger ale, half and half or some other mix.

title: 141. PUNCH SLUSH FOR A BUNCH
info:
PUNCH SLUSH FOR A BUNCH

ingredients

3 c. water
2 c. sugar
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice, diluted as suggested
3 bananas, pureed in blender
1/4 c. lemon juice

preparation

Bring water and sugar to boil. Cool slightly. Add remaining ingredients. Mix together and freeze. Set out one hour before using. Pour 3 quarts ginger ale over slush. Do not add ice. Punch should have an icy slush floating on top. Delicious!

This punch receives raves from all who taste it. Our school librarian introduced it to me.

title: 258. SLUSH PUNCH FOR A CROWD
info:
SLUSH PUNCH FOR A CROWD

ingredients

2 c. sugar
1 (6 oz.) pkg. flavored gelatin (any one)
6 c. boiling water
2 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
4 bottles (1 liter each) ginger ale, chilled

preparation

In 6-quart container, combine sugar and gelatin powder. Add boiling water; stir until dissolved. Add pineapple juice; mix well. Pour into plastic containers and freeze at least 24 hours. About an hour before serving time, put out containers to thaw. Empty containers into large punch bowl; break mixture into chunks with wooden spoon. Add ginger ale; mix to a slushy consistency.

title: 261. STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 c. boiling water
2 small pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid
1 small pkg. strawberry jello
1 qt. ginger ale
2 c. sugar
1 qt. crushed sweet strawberries
1 large can pineapple juice

preparation

Dissolve Kool-Aid, jello, and sugar in boiling water. Add strawberries and pineapple juice. Cool and freeze in Ziploc bags. About 1/2 hour before serving set out. At serving time, add ginger ale and chop to mix. You may use NutraSweet jello and Kool-Aid and leave off sugar for low sugar recipe.

title: 190. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 (3 oz.) pkg. any-flavor jello
2 c. boiling water
2 c. cold water
2 (48 oz.) cans pineapple juice
2 c. sugar
1 (2-liter) ginger ale or 7-Up

preparation

Dissolve jello in boiling water; stir in cold water. Add juice and sugar. Stir until all sugar is dissolved. Pour into ice cream pail and freeze. Remove from freezer 2 hours before serving.

Use 1/2 pail per punch bowl. Add soda to fill rest of bowl. If too sweet, add water. Makes 2 punch bowls full. No need to make ice rings as punch will be slushy and will stay cold.

title: 93. FRUIT PUNCH SLUSH
info:
FRUIT PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

1 (12 oz.) can orange juice concentrate
6 bananas
3 c. water
2 (64 oz.) lemon-lime drinks
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (6 oz.) can lemonade concentrate
2 c. sugar

preparation

Blend bananas and juice concentrates in blender until smooth. Combine remaining ingredients, except lemon-lime. Mix well in a large bowl. Put into containers to freeze (may be placed in 2 containers). Thaw slightly before serving. Pour lemon-lime soda over fruit mix. Should be slushy. Garnish with orange slices.

title: 241. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 large can pineapple juice
3 c. sugar
5 c. water
2 small cans frozen orange juice
1 small can frozen lemonade
5 very ripe bananas
2 to 3 (2 liter) bottles 7-Up or ginger ale

preparation

Heat pineapple juice, sugar and water until sugar is dissolved. In a blender or with a potato masher, blend frozen orange juice and lemonade and bananas. Combine the 2 mixtures and freeze in a large bowl or decorative ice ring. Thaw 1 to 1 1/2 hours (or less if you like). Place in a large punch bowl and add 7-Up or ginger ale as you like. Makes 24 to 30 servings.

title: 178. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry gelatin
1 c. sugar
2 c. boiling water
1 large can pineapple juice
16 oz. lemon-lime soda

preparation

Mix gelatin, sugar and boiling water together until dissolved. Add pineapple juice, then enough water to make 1 gallon. Freeze overnight. Just before serving, put in punch bowl and add lemon-lime soda. Stir until slushy.

title: 134. PUNCH SLUSH
info:
PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

4 c. sugar
6 c. water
5 bananas
2 small cans frozen lemonade
2 small cans orange juice
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
6 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Put bananas in blender. Bring sugar and water to boil and boil for 5 minutes. Cool. Add to juices and bananas. Put into 6 (1 quart) containers. Freeze.

Before serving time, take from freezer and let thaw for a short time. Add 1 quart ginger ale to each portion and stir until slushy. Serves 50 to 60.

title: 40. BANANA PUNCH SLUSH
info:
BANANA PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

6 c. water
2 c. sugar
46 oz. can of pineapple juice
12 oz. can of frozen orange juice
12 oz. can of frozen lemonade
2 (12 oz.) cans of water
5 mashed bananas
2 liter bottle of ginger ale

preparation

Boil sugar and 6 cups of water and cool. Add orange juice, lemonade, pineapple juice, water and bananas. Freeze. Take out frozen mixture 3-4 hours before serving to make it slushy. Add ginger ale before serving.

title: 181. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH
(Serves 50 People, 8 Ounce Cups)

ingredients

3 (3 oz.) pkg. Jell-O (any color)
3 c. sugar
3 qt. hot water
1 1/2 c. plus 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 (46 oz.) pineapple juice
2 qt. cold water
2 qt. 7-Up, Sprite, sparkle water or ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve Jell-O and sugar in hot water. Add lemon juice, pineapple juice and cold water. Then freeze overnight or 6 to 12 hours. Remove, shake and add 7-Up or one of the others. Delicious. Great for weddings or showers, just any time. Freeze in punch bowl.

title: 217. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 small pkg. Jell-O (any color)
9 c. boiling water
4 c. sugar
4 c. warm water
1 (16 oz.) bottle ReaLemon juice
2 (40 oz.) cans pineapple juice
2 (2 liter) bottles 7-Up or Sprite

preparation

Dissolve Jell-O in bowl with boiling water. Mix warm water and sugar together. Bring to a boil. Add dissolved Jell-O to the sugar and water mixture. Let cool. Add lemon and pineapple juice to jello mixture. Mix well. Put in 2 large containers. Freeze. When ready to use, remove from freezer 4 to 5 hours ahead of time so it may thaw. When it gets slushy, pour 7-Up over it and enjoy. Makes 2 large punch bowls.

title: 279. ALMOND TEA PUNCH
info:
ALMOND TEA PUNCH

ingredients

1 can frozen lemonade
1 pt. sugar (2 c.)
1 qt. water (4 c.)
1 c. strong tea (1 tea bag)
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 tsp. almond extract
1 bottle ginger ale (1 qt.)
coloring to suit occasion

preparation

Make a simple syrup of sugar and water. Mix all ingredients together. Chill. Add chilled ginger ale just before serving. Makes 1 gallon.

Praising God in less than good situations is the shortest route to answered prayer. Proverbs 14:26

title: 88. FROZEN PUNCH SLUSH
info:
FROZEN PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

1 large frozen orange juice
1 large frozen lemonade
1 can unsweetened pineapple juice
1 c. sugar, dissolved in warm water

preparation

Mix and freeze items. Add ginger ale, Sprite or 7-Up to partially thawed mixture when ready to serve.

title: 49. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid
1 c. sugar
1 qt. water
1 large can pineapple juice
6 bananas

preparation

Mix Kool-Aid, sugar, water and pineapple juice. Puree bananas in blender and add to Kool-Aid mixture. Freeze in large container for 2 days or until ready to use. Thaw for 3 to 4 hours; stir to slush.

title: 174. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 c. sugar
3 c. cold water
1 large can pineapple juice
1/2 oz. almond extract
1 pkg. Kool-Aid or Jell-O
3 c. hot water
1 small can frozen lemonade
1 to 2 bottles ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve sugar in 2 cups hot water. Dissolve Kool-Aid or Jell-O in 1 cup hot water. Add remaining ingredients, except ginger ale. Freeze. Thaw to a slush before serving and add ginger ale.

title: 165. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

12 oz. frozen orange juice, diluted as directed
12 oz. frozen pineapple juice, diluted as directed
5 bananas
1 c. lemon juice
6 c. water
4 c. sugar
grapefruit soda

preparation

In a blender, mix 5 bananas and lemon juice. Add orange juice and pineapple juice. Last add water and sugar. Freeze in a plastic container. Add grapefruit soda when ready to serve.

title: 29. TEA BAG SLUSH
info:
TEA BAG SLUSH

ingredients

4 tea bags
2 c. sugar
1 (12 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1/5 gin

preparation

Boil tea bags in 2 cups water and cool. Boil sugar in 7 cups water and cool. Mix all together and freeze. Makes 1 gallon. Serve in glass with 1/2 slush mixture and 1/2 Team or 7-Up.

title: 138. PUNCH SLUSH
info:
PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

2 pkg. Kool-Aid *
3 small pkg. Jell-O *
8 c. boiling water
6 c. sugar
16 oz. bottle ReaLemon
1 large can pineapple juice
1 gal. cold water

preparation

*Choose Kool-Aid and Jell-O color according to color theme.

Blend first 3 ingredients together. Add remaining ingredients. Freeze until solid or partially slushy. When thawed to adequate slush property, add 4 liters 7-Up to serve. Makes 3 gallons.

title: 70. BANANA SLUSH PUNCH
info:
BANANA SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 c. water
1 (12 oz.) can frozen orange juice
1 (48 oz.) can pineapple juice
4 c. sugar
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade
5 ripe bananas, mashed

preparation

Bring water and sugar to a boil; cool. Combine with remaining ingredients. Divide into quart freezer containers and freeze overnight or a month.

Remove from freezer 3 hours before serving time. Add 1 quart of ginger ale for each quart of punch. Punch is best served slushy, not liquid. Perfect for weddings or golden anniversaries.

title: 277. AFTERNOON TEA PUNCH
info:
AFTERNOON TEA PUNCH

ingredients

4 c. (1 qt.) boiling water
6 tea bags
1 Tbsp. dried mint
1/2 to 2/3 c. sugar
1 small frozen orange juice
1 small frozen lemonade

preparation

Pour boiling water over tea bags and mint and let steep for 10 minutes, strain. Stir in sugar until it melts, add frozen juice and water to taste. Serve with fresh sprig of mint.

title: 205. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 1/2 c. sugar
6 c. water
2 - 3 oz. pkg. mixed fruit flavored gelatin
1 - 46 oz. can pineapple juice
1 quart orange juice
2/3 c. lemon juice
2 - 28 oz. bottles ginger-ale, chilled

preparation

Combine sugar and water in large saucepan. Bring to boil. Simmer three minutes. Stir in jello and juices. Ladle into wide topped freezer containers. Leave 1 inch head space. Cover tightly and freeze.

To serve - Partially thaw juice blocks at room temperature about 5 hours. Place in punch bowl. Stir with fork to break up ice chunks. Add ginger-ale. Serves 25.

title: 156. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 small pkg. jello (flavor determines color of punch)
9 c. water
4 c. sugar
8 c. water
16 oz. lemon juice
2 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
6 large ginger ale or 7-Up

preparation

Dissolve jello in boiling water. Cool. Combine sugar and water. Bring to quick boil to dissolve sugar. Remove from fire and cool. Combine dissolved jello and sugar water. Add lemon juice and pineapple juice; put into container and freeze. Best made 2 days before using. Remove from container into punch bowl; add ginger ale and break up frozen punch. Take from freezer 2 to 3 hours before serving.

title: 193. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 large pkg. jello
4 c. sugar
2 c. ReaLemon juice
4 c. boiling water
9 c. cold water
2 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice

preparation

Mix and freeze. Take out 3 to 4 hours ahead. When soft, stir in 2 large ginger ale.

title: 120. ORANGE SLUSH PUNCH
info:
ORANGE SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 c. sugar
4 mashed bananas
2 (12 oz.) cans frozen orange juice, thawed and undiluted
1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (67.6 oz.) bottle lemon-lime carbonated beverage, chilled
6 c. water
1/2 c. lemon juice

preparation

Combine sugar and water in Dutch oven; cook over high heat until sugar is dissolved. Let cool. Add bananas, lemon juice, orange juice and pineapple juice. Freeze until firm. Remove from freezer 2 hours before serving. Break frozen mixture into large pieces; put in punch bowl. Pour soda over and stir gently. Makes 6 1/2 quarts.

title: 145. REFRESHING PUNCH SLUSH
info:
REFRESHING PUNCH SLUSH

ingredients

8 small pkg. Jell-O (any flavor)
16 c. boiling water
6 c. sugar
8 c. cold water
3 (12 oz.) cans frozen lemonade
4 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
4 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve Jell-O and sugar in boiling water. Add cold water and juices. Place in clean milk cartons or plastic soft drink bottles, leaving room for expansion when frozen. Place in freezer for at least 8 hours.

To serve, cut away the container from the block of punch. Add ginger ale and break up to form slushy mixture. Add ginger ale or frozen punch as necessary to replenish punch bowl. Serves 100. Lemon, lime or strawberry Jell-O works well in this recipe. Choose a flavor to compliment the color scheme of your event.

title: 188. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 pkg Kool-Aid
1 lg. can unsweetened pineapple juice

preparation

Mix Kool-Aid (any flavor) according to package directions. Stir in juice and place in freezer. Stir 1 time each hour for 6 hours. Delicious!

title: 195. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade
1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice
3 pkg. raspberry Kool-Aid
2 c. sugar
4 c. water
1 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Combine all ingredients except ginger ale. Freeze to slush. Add ginger ale just before serving. Yields 15 to 18 servings.

title: 257. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

1 (6 oz.) pkg. jello (any flavor)
1 large can pineapple juice
5 c. water
1 c. sugar
1 qt. 7-Up

preparation

Prepare jello as package directs. Add pineapple juice, water and sugar. Pour into container and place in freezer overnight. When ready to use, put slush into punch bowl. Add 7-Up or ginger ale. Stir slightly before serving. Yields 150 ounces.

title: 263. STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH
info:
STRAWBERRY SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

4 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry gelatin
4 c. boiling water
4 c. sugar (I used about 3 c.)
4 c. cold water
2 c. lemon juice
2 (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice
2 qt. ginger ale

preparation

Dissolve gelatin in 4 cups boiling water. Combine sugar and 4 cups cold water. Bring to a boil until sugar dissolves. Add to gelatin and cool. When cool, add lemon and pineapple juices. Mix well. Pour into containers suitable for freezing. Freeze. Take out several hours before time to use. (Should be slushy.) Add ginger ale before serving.

I adjust the amount of ginger ale according to the amount in the freezer container that is being used.

title: 210. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

6 pkg. strawberry, unsweetened Kool-Aid
2 large cans unsweetened pineapple juice
2 large cans warm water
6 c. sugar

preparation

Mix and freeze. When ready to serve, add one 2-liter bottle ginger ale. Mix until slush.

title: 99. FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH
info:
FRUIT SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

2 1/2 qt. water
3 (6 oz.) cans frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed and undiluted
2 (46 oz.) cans unsweetened pineapple juice
2 (14 oz.) envelopes cherry or lemon-lime flavored unsweetened drink mix
8 (10 oz.) bottles ginger ale

preparation

Combine all ingredients except ginger ale. Stir until drink mix dissolves. Divide mixture evenly into 4 gallon size, heavy-duty zip-top plastic bags; freeze. Remove each bag 1 hour before serving. Place in punch bowl and break into chunks. Add 2 bottles ginger ale into each bag of mixture. Stir until slushy. Yield: 2 1/2 gallons or 2 1/2 quarts per bag of mixture.

title: 115. LEMON-LIME SLUSH PUNCH
info:
LEMON-LIME SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 pkg. lime jello
4 c. sugar
7 c. water and 6 c. water
1 (16 oz.) bottle ReaLemon juice
2 large (46 oz.) cans pineapple juice

preparation

Mix the lime jello and sugar and dissolve with 7 cups of water, then add 6 more cups of water. After mixing well, add the ReaLemon juice and pineapple juice. Pour mixture into several containers to freeze solid. To serve, thaw to slush by adding 2 or 3 bottles of ginger ale.

title: 213. SLUSH PUNCH
info:
SLUSH PUNCH

ingredients

3 small pkg. strawberry Jell-O
2 c. sugar
46 oz. boiling water
46 oz. pineapple juice
46 oz. cold water
2 (2 liter) bottles 7-Up or ginger ale

preparation

Mix Jell-O, sugar and boiling water. Add juices and cold water. Put into small containers. Freeze. Unthaw a bit and put in with pop in punch bowl.
